90a4(mdo sde): gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu/
90a5(mdo sde): dang rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus
90a6(mdo sde): mo ga yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
90a7(mdo sde): 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ram/ rgyal po'i pho
90b1(mdo sde): brang 'khor gang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang gi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por gyur pa gang la la zhig/ lha'i dbang po'i
90b2(mdo sde): dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis rgyal po bgyid cing rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam/ rim gro bgyid dam/ mchod pa bgyid dam/ dge
90b3(mdo sde): slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang du bgyid/ btsun par bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing
90b4(mdo sde): mchod de/ rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu bo'i chus/ chos bdud rtsi'o khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog
90b5(mdo sde): tu bcas pa bzhi dang gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi byon chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ / bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs chen por
90b6(mdo sde): yang bgyid par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi gzi byin dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi
90b7(mdo sde): dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang lus bltar mi gda' bar bgyis te/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/
91a1(mdo sde): yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po
91a2(mdo sde): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gror bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su
91a3(mdo sde): gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang ba de legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang
91a4(mdo sde): yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang pa dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar
91a5(mdo sde): bgyi'o/ / yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang slar bzlog par bgyi'o//
91a6(mdo sde): mi'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gror bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis
91a7(mdo sde): la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba de'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der song ste/ yul de rnam par gzhig go/
91b1(mdo sde): snyam du sems skyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'o gzi brjid kyi mthus dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de gzhan
91b2(mdo sde): dag dang g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyin na yang yul 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du gza' dang / nad kyang
91b3(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du bral ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'ang ba nye ba'i rgyal po de rang gi yul du phyin na/ gnod pa sgra
91b4(mdo sde): tshogs brgya dang / brel ba sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'ad ba nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag ba sogs te/ pha rol gyi
91b5(mdo sde): dmag tshogs su mchi ba'i slad du/ rang gi yul nas byung ste/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo
91b6(mdo sde): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig par 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/
91b7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi gda' bar bgyid de/ der mchi bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de shul du zhugs pa las kyang / de nyid nas ldog par
92a1(mdo sde): bgyi'o/ / brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// bgegs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de mchi bar
92a2(mdo sde): yang mi nus na/ yul gzhig par bgyid pa lta ga la 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po
92a3(mdo sde): dag legs so legs so/ / rgyal po chen po dag khyed yang legs so// khyed bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ bla na med pa yang
92a4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag la kun tu srung
92a5(mdo sde): bar gyis shig/ yongs su sgrub pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su sbyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ rgyal po'i pho
92a6(mdo sde): brang 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu srungs shig/ yongs su skyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su sbyang ba
92a7(mdo sde): dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par gyis shig/
92b1(mdo sde): pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang zlog par gyis shig/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i rgyal po de dag mi 'thab pa dang / mtshang mi 'dru ba dang / mi rtsod pa dang / mi 'gyed
92b2(mdo sde): par bya ba la spyod par gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir/ nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag na/ rgyal po chen po brgyad khri bzhi
92b3(mdo sde): stong po de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dga' ba dang / rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / phan tshun
92b4(mdo sde): rnam par 'tshe ba mi skyed pa dang / rang gis ji ltar sngon gyi las bsags pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du g.yul 'jig par mi byed pa
92b5(mdo sde): dang / yul gzhig pa'i phyir/ pha rol gyis mi gnod pa dang / nam 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir/ grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phan tshun du byams
92b6(mdo sde): pa'i sems su 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems su 'gyur te/ phan tshun du mi 'thab/ mtshang mo 'dru/ mi rtsod/ mi 'gyed par rang rang gi yul dag na dga'
92b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rgyas par 'gyur/ lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo
93a1(mdo sde): dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur/ sa yang byin can du 'gyur/ dus dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / lo khyud 'khor thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par
93a2(mdo sde): 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma yang nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ char pa'i rgyun kyang sa la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling tham
93a3(mdo sde): cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang nor 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ longs spyod che ba dang / ser sna med par 'gyur/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i
93a4(mdo sde): lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i khang khyim rnams kyang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag la
93a5(mdo sde): la zhig mi'i rgyal por 'gyur la/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur te/ rim gro byas/ mchod par byas/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge
93a6(mdo sde): bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog
93a7(mdo sde): tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang brtse ba'i phyir rtag par rgyun du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu klung / chos bdud rtsi'i
93b1(mdo sde): khu ba 'dis/ khyed cag gi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyur ro// khyed kyi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin chen po yang rnam par 'phel lo// khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang mthu dang stobs
93b2(mdo sde): kyang skyed do/ / khyed kyi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
93b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga la yang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / mi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
93b4(mdo sde): byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la yang yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rgya che ba/ yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// des na
93b5(mdo sde): mi'i rgyal po chen po de la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ / des na mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa
93b6(mdo sde): spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde lags su 'gyur bar byas par 'gyur ro// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
93b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyang bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs
94a1(mdo sde): su 'gyur bar byas par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang / ches gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / ches stobs dang ldan pa dang /
94a2(mdo sde): bde ba dang yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu srung bar 'gyur
94a3(mdo sde): yongs su sbyang bar 'gyur/ gnod pa med par 'gyur/ dgra med par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par
94a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes
94a5(mdo sde): po dang / rgyal po chen po mog mi bzang dang / de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
94a6(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang nyan 'tshal bar gyur/ bdag nyid la yang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo
94a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / btsun mo 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la'ang / bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag thams cad la yang zhi ba dang / bde legs su
94b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ tshe 'di nyid la bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa
94b2(mdo sde): rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchi pa yang yongs su 'dzin 'tshal bar gyur/
94b3(mdo sde): bdag gis yul thams cad kun tu bsrung 'tshal bar gyur/ yongs su bskyang ba 'tshal bar gyur/ rang gi yul na gnod pa ma mchis pa dang / dgra ma mchis pa dang / pha rol gyi
94b4(mdo sde): dmag tshogs kyis mi rdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba ma mchis pa dang / 'khrug pa ma mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des g.yeng ba ma
94b5(mdo sde): mchis pa'i sems dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / ri mo dang bcas pa sa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsti stang du bgyis te mnyan par bgyi'o// gser 'od
94b6(mdo sde): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa'i slad du/ mi'i rgyal po des/ rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags par mtsha bar bgyi'o// der mchis nas kyang / rgyal po'i
94b7(mdo sde): pho brang spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab cing / me tog sil ma sna tshogs bkram par bgyi'o// spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa der/ chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan
95a1(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa bsham par bgyi'o/ / phyogs der gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bgyi'o//
95a2(mdo sde): mi'i rgyal po des lus bkru bar bgyi'o// gos dri rab tu bda' ba/ gos gsar pa mdzes pa bgos nas/ rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan par bgyi'o// bdag gis stan rab tu dma'
95a3(mdo sde): ba gding bar bgyis te/ stan de la mchis nas/ rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par mi bgyi'o// der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o// rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal
95a4(mdo sde): dang / dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de la yang ston par 'du
95a5(mdo sde): shes bskyed par bgyi'o/ / mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams
95a6(mdo sde): la sdug pa dang phan pas blta bar bgyi'o/ / btsun mo dam pa rnams dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams la tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi
95a7(mdo sde): tshogs thams cad la yang tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o/ / chos mnyan pa'i phyir mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs spyod du stsal bar bgyi'o// dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma
95b1(mdo sde): mchis pas bdag tshim par bgyi'o/ / dga' ba dang bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o// dbang po bde bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o//
95b2(mdo sde): bdag dga' ba chen pos dga' bar bgyi'o// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas/ chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal
95b3(mdo sde): po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rgyal po chen po dag de'i tshe de'i dus na mi'i rgyal po des gos thams cad dkar po gsar pa mdzes pa bgo bar bya'o// spud pa dang
95b4(mdo sde): rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par brgyan par bgyi'o/ / gdugs dkar po yang gzung bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i bkod pa chen pos bkra shi sa tha
95b5(mdo sde): dad pa sna tshogs thogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung la/ chos smra ba de bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i rgyal po der gom pa ji snyed por ba
95b6(mdo sde): de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gis 'khor ba phyir snyil bar 'gyur/ de snyed kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag thob par 'gyur/
95b7(mdo sde): der gom pa de snyed bor ba de snyed du/ tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyag chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar gnas
96a1(mdo sde): yangs shing rgya che ba/ lha'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dag thob par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyi rgyal rigs dang lha'i che ba 'bum phrag du ma thob
96a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar 'os
96a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjod pa shin tu rgya che bar 'gyur/ bsngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan
96a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba thob par 'gyur/ stobs che bar 'gyur/ tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur/
96a5(mdo sde): mdzes pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
96a6(mdo sde): rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag yon tan gyi phan yon 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong nas/ mi'i rgyal
96a7(mdo sde): po des dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ba bsu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang / dpag tshad stong du yang bsu bar bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// yang 'di snyam
96b1(mdo sde): du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom//
96b2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'diri bshos gsol bar 'gyur ro// deng ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
96b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa mnyan par bgyi'o/ / deng ba dag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
96b4(mdo sde): las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o/ / deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro// deng ba dag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon
96b5(mdo sde): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis sems can dmyal ba
96b6(mdo sde): dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag gi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig
96b7(mdo sde): 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon
97a1(mdo sde): bskyed par 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par
97a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar 'khor ba las yongs su thar par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bla na
97a3(mdo sde): med pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// deng
97a4(mdo sde): bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag
97a5(mdo sde): gis yul 'di dag thams cad kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ / yongs su bskyang ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / dgra med pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba
97a6(mdo sde): dang / nad 'go ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen
97a7(mdo sde): ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa de dag la/ mi'i rgyal po de dam pa'i chos la gus pa de lta bus bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par
97b1(mdo sde): byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / lha'i tshogs de dag dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dag la shas kyi dam pa byin na/ mi'i rgyal po de bsod nams
97b2(mdo sde): mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dang / tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa des rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la
97b3(mdo sde): rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzi brjid kyis kyang brgyan par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba thams cad dang
97b4(mdo sde): dgra thams cad chos dang 'thun par shin tu tshar chod par 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun
97b5(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la de chos la gus pa de lta bus/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan la/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen
97b6(mdo sde): nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid/ mchod par bgyid cing / rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi slad du/ rgyal
97b7(mdo sde): po'i pho brang de shin tu dag par phyag 'dar bgyid/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig thun mong du chos mnyan pa de dag
98a1(mdo sde): nyan cing / bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shes cung zad cig sbyin par bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi stan
98a2(mdo sde): la mchis ma tha ga tu/ mi'i rgyal po des bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'o don gyi slad du/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdug par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
98a3(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du/ bdug pas bdug sa ma thag tu/ spos sna tshogs las spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang
98a4(mdo sde): cig yud tsam de la rgyal po chen po bdag cag bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khro shing dag go gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur ro/ / spos dri
98a5(mdo sde): rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des bdag cag gi khang pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan
98a6(mdo sde): 'das spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs
98a7(mdo sde): can ma dang / lha mo chen mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang
98b1(mdo sde): gnod sbyin gyi ste dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sdeng dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya 'khor dang ldan pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po mdzes pa dang / klu
98b2(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / de dag gi rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la byung ste/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing gi gdug sa rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri sna
98b3(mdo sde): tshogs rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ khang pa rnams kyi nang du gser du snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des gnas thams cad snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// de skad
98b4(mdo sde): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi steng
98b5(mdo sde): gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par ma zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dag/ mi'o rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa mdo
98b6(mdo sde): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu/ lag na pog snod cig thogs pa de las/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing
98b7(mdo sde): rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad na/ gang na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba
99a1(mdo sde): phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang / khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang
99a2(mdo sde): gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag rgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum cu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya nas/ 'du shes med min du nye bar song ba'i
99a3(mdo sde): bar gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i rigs bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad nas/ lha dang / klu
99a4(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin dang / dro za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams kyi rang rang gi khang pa dag gi steng gi bar snang la/ spos
99a5(mdo sde): dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos kyi dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnams su gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba yang
99a6(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des kyang lha'i khang pa rnams snang bar byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha'i
99a7(mdo sde): khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa'i khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas pa de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod
99b1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po des spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus spros dang / bdug pa sna tshogs
99b2(mdo sde): kyi khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag
99b3(mdo sde): khrig 'bum phrag rnams su/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang+gA'i klang gi bye ma snyed dag gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing rnams su
99b4(mdo sde): gnas par 'gyur/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing che ba mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'o//
99b5(mdo sde): snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag cho/
99b6(mdo sde): 'phrul chen po de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ chos smra ba de la dgongs par 'gyur te/ skyes bu
99b7(mdo sde): dam pa legs so legs so/ / skyes bu dam pa khyod gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i tshul 'di lta du/ zab mo'i don 'di lta bu/ zab mor snang ba 'di lta bu/ yon
100a1(mdo sde): tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'dod pa/ khyod yang legs so legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur//
100a2(mdo sde): ro// su tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang
100a3(mdo sde): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'khor la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa gser
100a4(mdo sde): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
100a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ / de nas phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du
100a6(mdo sde): ma rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa dag gis/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshig 'thun pa dang / ngag 'thun pa dang / sgra skad 'thun pas dge slong chos smra ba/ chos kyi khri stan la
100a7(mdo sde): 'dug pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/
100b1(mdo sde): shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub spyod
100b2(mdo sde): pa'i stobs pa skyes pa'i byon gyi rlabs dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag ston par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po la legs par rgyan par byed par 'gyur/
100b3(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug ste/ bdud kyi sde bsam gyis
100b4(mdo sde): mi khyab pa/ gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ mi sdug pa ston pa/ gzugs mi sdug pa sna tshogs dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po
100b5(mdo sde): mchog dam par song ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de pe med par rab tu zhi ba/ rdul dang bral ba/ zab mo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa
100b6(mdo sde): khyod rdo rje'i gdan snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstan pa mchog tu zab pa/ bla na med pa rnam pa bcu gnyis rab tu skor bar 'gyur/
100b7(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rnga chen po bla na med pa 'bar brdung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi dung bla na med pa 'bud par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po
101a1(mdo sde): sbeng bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi sgron ma bla na med pa 'bar bar byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi char bla na med pa 'bebs par 'gyur/ skyes bu
101a2(mdo sde): dam pa khyod nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'bum phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma shin tu 'jigs su rung ba/ 'jigs pa chen po'i
101a3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las yongs su thar par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod
101a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag mnyes par 'gyur zhes gsung bar 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis
101a5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i yon tan tshe 'di'am/ ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong // sangs rgyas
101a6(mdo sde): 'bum phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa mthong nas/ snying brtse ba'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
101a7(mdo sde): cag rgyal po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma rang rang gi khang pa na mchis pa dag/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag gi gdugs kyis bskul ma
101b1(mdo sde): thag tu/ lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i khang pa brtsegs pa phyag bdar ma mchis pa/ legs par phyag bdar bgyis pa/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par
101b2(mdo sde): btab pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po
101b3(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ma dang / lha mo chen mo dpal dang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen
101b4(mdo sde): po nyi shu brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya'i 'khor
101b5(mdo sde): can dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang rgyan sna tshogs kyis
101b6(mdo sde): brgyan pa de ga la ba dang / chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/ me tog bkram pa'i sa la bshams par 'gyur ba ga la ba der/ chos mnyan
101b7(mdo sde): pa'i slad du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma de dag thams cad 'thun par bgyis
102a1(mdo sde): te/ mi'i rgyal po dge ba'i grogs bgyid pa/ dge ba thob par bgyid pa/ bla na med pa/ chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la/ chos bdud rtsi'i khub 'dis tshim
102a2(mdo sde): par gyur ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar
102a3(mdo sde): bgyi de/ mi'i rgyal po'i pho brang de dang / grong khyer de dang / yul de yang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang
102a4(mdo sde): zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyid do// chad pa spang bar yang bgyi'o// yul der yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las
102a5(mdo sde): yongs su thar par bgyi'o/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di byung la/
102a6(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po de/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma ga ser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa dag la bsti stang
102a7(mdo sde): du mi bgyid/ bla mar mi bgyid/ rim gror mi bgyid/ mchod par mi bgyid na/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la chos mnyan pa 'dra
102b1(mdo sde): dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par mi bgyid/ rim gror mi bgyid/ lha'i lus 'di dag gzi byin yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid ngo // bdag cag gi brtson 'grus dang / mthu
102b2(mdo sde): dang stobs kyang mi skyed/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang dpal phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po
102b3(mdo sde): chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis yul de yal bar dor bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis yul de
102b4(mdo sde): yal bar bor na/ yul na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang / yul de yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/
102b5(mdo sde): yul der yul rnam par 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'thab pa skye ba dang
102b6(mdo sde): mtshang 'dru ba skye ba dang / rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/ dngogs dang 'gyed par 'gyur ba dang / gza' dang nad rnam pa sna tshogs yul du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyogs tha dad pa rnams skar mngar
102b7(mdo sde): ltung bar 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun mi mthun par gda' bar 'gyur/ dgung zla 'char ba na nyi ma lta bur gda' bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i gza' dang / nyi ma'i gza'
103a1(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' la gnas pa yang / rtag par rgyun du sgra gcan gyi gnod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dus dus su nam mkha' la 'dzal la
103a2(mdo sde): dog lta bu 'khyims par 'gyur/ sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur/ sa la gnas pa'i khron pa yang sgra 'byin pa grags par 'gyur/ yul du rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/ char pa drag po 'bab par
103a3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ yul du mu ge'i yang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur/ yul de phung bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar 'gyur/
103a4(mdo sde): yul de nyams mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang / yul na gnas
103a5(mdo sde): pa'i lha dang klu rnams kyi yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der 'di lta bu'i gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la
103a6(mdo sde): la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de dag nyid la kun tu bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs yun ring por myong bar 'tshal bar gyur/ bde ba thams cad
103a7(mdo sde): bstabs pa'i sems kyis rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad pham
103b1(mdo sde): par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ yul thams cad du yun ring du yongs su skyong 'tshal bar gyur/ chos kyis rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rang gi yul yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod
103b2(mdo sde): pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las su thar par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam
103b3(mdo sde): pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyid/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang du
103b4(mdo sde): bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ rim gror bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang / chos mnyan pa'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang /
103b5(mdo sde): chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dri tshim par bgyi/ bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin chen po yang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
103b6(mdo sde): mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyam par bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang po'i 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig
103b7(mdo sde): rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa bstan pa dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / drang srong mngon
104a1(mdo sde): par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can dag gi don gyi slad du/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji
104a2(mdo sde): snyed bstan pa dag pas ches mchog/ ches khyad par du 'phags pa/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang po 'bum
104a3(mdo sde): phrag de dag dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas ches mchog/ ches khyad par du 'phag
104a4(mdo sde): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad pa lags so/ / tsa nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis//
104a5(mdo sde): rgyal pos rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang / ci nas sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas rang gi yul kun tu srung bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs su sbyang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas
104a6(mdo sde): yul thams cad na gnod pa dang / dgra ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams pham ste/ phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul de dag na nad 'go
104a7(mdo sde): ba ma mchis shing / 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul thams cad chos kyis 'khrug par ma mchis shing mi rdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas mi'i rgyal po de dag gis/ rang rang
104b1(mdo sde): gi yul rnams su chos kyi sgron ma chen mo 'bar bar bgyis shing / snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas lha'i khang khyim thams cad lha dag dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ba
104b2(mdo sde): dang / ci nas bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad tshoms pa dang / rim
104b3(mdo sde): gror bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / tsi nas bdag gi lus la brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang /
104b4(mdo sde): mthu chen po skyed par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / sun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad
104b5(mdo sde): du lo legs shing nyams dga' la/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba
104b6(mdo sde): sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas sems can thams cad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'o bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba dag myong bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas
104b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de
105a1(mdo sde): dag thams cad ldan/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
105a2(mdo sde): phrag dag pas ches 'phags pa'i thugs rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gi lha'i shes pa bas ches 'phags pa'i de
105a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas ches 'phags pa'i byin gyi rlabs
105a4(mdo sde): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
105a5(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad do/ / mi'i rgyal po'i dgos pa dang / rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang / rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad
105a6(mdo sde): na mchis pa dang / gang dag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
105a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dir nye bar bstan/ yongs su brjod// yang dag par rab tu bshad do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu de dang rkyen des
105b1(mdo sde): mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gus par mnyan par bgyi/ gus par rim gror bgyi/ gus par mchod par bgyi'o// de skad/
105b2(mdo sde): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pas/ gdon mi za
105b3(mdo sde): bar mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir spro ba rgya cher gyis shig/ rgyal po
105b4(mdo sde): chen po dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chug cig dang / de dag lha
105b5(mdo sde): dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chang
105b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis ci nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma bsrung ba dang / gnod pa med
105b7(mdo sde): pa dang / nad med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / sems bde bar 'gro zhing / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur bar/ dge
106a1(mdo sde): slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kun tu bsrung bar bya/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung
106a2(mdo sde): ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu stan las langs te/ 'di skad ces gsol to//
106a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes pa'i gzungs mchis pa 'di/ sems can gang la la dag 'dzin cing 'chang bar mos pa de la bsod nams dpag tu ma mchis
106a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu de la bdag gis srung zhing bskyabs pas/ de'i sdug bsngal thams cad bsal te/ bde bar gnas par bgyi'o// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
106a5(mdo sde): tshogs kyang bskyed par bgyi'o/ / gang gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin par 'dod pas lus bsrung ba'i phyir/ sngags 'di sngar brjod par bgyi'o// na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ ma hA rA dzA ya/
106a6(mdo sde): tad+ya thA/ ra ra ra ra/ ku no ku no/ khu no khu no/ ru no ru no/ sa ba sa ba/ ka ra ka ra/ bi kA ra ma/ ma hA bi kA ra ma/ ma hA bi kA ram/ ma hA kA la/ ma hA rA dza/ ra kA rak+kha tu mAn/ sarba
106a7(mdo sde): satwa nAn tsa swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das sngags 'di skud pa dkar po la sngags lan re bzlas shing mdud pa lan re bor te/ de ltar lan bdun byas nas/ dpung pa la btags na don de nges
106b1(mdo sde): par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang na/ khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gyon te/ spos gu gul dang / tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / du ru ka dang / a ka ru dang / spos
106b2(mdo sde): dkar po la sogs pa 'di dag cha mnyam par sbyar ba'i spos kyis mchod cing sngags 'di bzlas pas/ rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu spun drang bar bya'o// na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ ma hA d+hA na dA ya/
106b3(mdo sde): tsan De shA rA ya/ A ka ra Sha/ a pa ra dzi ti/ tsan De shwa rA/ pa ra ma/ kA ru Ni ka/ sarba satwA/ hi ta tsin ta/ ma ma d+ha na ba ra d+ho/ par+ye she spa yam A kar shA yA sA hA/ sngags 'di
106b4(mdo sde): lan bdun bzlas pa'i 'og tu/ rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o// sngags 'di 'don pa'i dus su/ dkon mchog gsum dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la sngar phyag 'tshal bar
106b5(mdo sde): bya'o/ / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa skong zhing nor sbyin pas sems can thams cad bde bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba'i sngags
106b6(mdo sde): 'di bzlas na/ sems can de dag yid bzhin du bde ba rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba'i
106b7(mdo sde): sngags kyi snying po 'di smras so/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ mo bai shra baNA ya/ ma hA rA dza ya/ tad+ya thA/ si mi si mi/ su mu su mu/ tsan Da tsa na Da/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ki la
107a1(mdo sde): ki la/ ku ru ku ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ san dA ya/ A da ma nam/ ni t+yan/ an da rad+hA tu swAhA/ na mo bai shra bar+N+Na ya swAhA/ d+ha na dA ya swAhA/ ma nor tha pa ri ru
107a2(mdo sde): ra ya swA hA/ sngags 'di sngar lan stong bzlas pa'i 'og tu/ khang pa dben pa'i nang du lci ba'i dkyil 'khor chung ngu zhig byas te/ bshos ci 'byor pas mchod par bya'o// spos dam pa bsregs
107a3(mdo sde): pa'i du ba'i rgyun mi 'chad par bya zhing / nyin mtshan du sems rtse gcig pas sngags kyi snying po 'di bdag nyid kyis thos pa tsam du bzlas pa byas pa ni/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi
107a4(mdo sde): bu'i sras/ dzi na ra sha b+ha zhes bya ba gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis/ de'i gan du mchis te/ nga'i yab la ci zhig gsol zhes dri bar byed do// de nas bdag ni dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i
107a5(mdo sde): phyir/ nor zhig gsol gyis stsal cig ces smros shig/ de nas sras dzi na ra sha b+ha sa/ yab la gsol pa/ skyes bu dam pa zhig dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyir/ nor zhig
107a6(mdo sde): gsol lo zhes gsol pa dang / yab kyis khyod myur du song la nyin gcig bzhin du kar sha pa Na brgya brgya byin cig ces bka' stsal to// de nas sngags bsgrub pa des/ ltas de lta bu
107a7(mdo sde): mthong nas don de grub par shes te/ gnas dben par bdag gcig pu spos bsregs la/ nyal khar sngas su dri'i za ma tog/ gcig gzhag ste nyal bar bya'o// de phyin chad nang nas
107b1(mdo sde): nor 'byung ba las/ nor de de'i nyin par dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i yo byad me tog dang / spos dang / zhal zas la sogs pa sbyar ba dang / brel cing 'phongs pa rnams la
107b2(mdo sde): yang sbyin pa yang mi zad par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad la byams par bsam mo// khro ba dang 'tshe ba'i bsam pa bskyed na/ de nyams par 'gyur bas khro ba'i sems mi skye bar
107b3(mdo sde): rtag tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ / de nas yang sngags 'di 'dzin pa des nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / gzhan yang sras dang / sras mo'i 'khor du bcas pa la
107b4(mdo sde): rtag par bsam zhing / bstong pa dang bsngags pa bya'o// rtag par dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis gtong zhing lha la sogs pa rnams kyi mthu dang / bsod nams mngon par 'phel
107b5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba rgyas pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang thob par 'gyur ro// lha de dag gis de ltar byed pa de mthong nas kun dga' zhing mgu rangs pas 'ong zhing de la
107b6(mdo sde): srung ba dang / skyob par byed do// sngags mkhan de nyid kyang tshe lo dpag tu med par gnas shing / ngan song gsum yongs su spang ba dang / bgegs dang bar chad thams cad
107b7(mdo sde): kyang med par 'gyur ro/ / yod bzhin gyi nor bu 'di dag dang / gter gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul la dbang sgyur zhing bsam pa thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro// gal te
108a1(mdo sde): longs spyod can du 'dod na yang yid bzhin du grub pa dang / bya dang gcan gzan gyi skad thams cad kyang shes par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das sngags bsgrub pa des
108a2(mdo sde): bdag mthong bar mtshal na tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bco lnga'i nyon par ras dkar po la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ka pi te dang sbyar ba'i tshon rtsis rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ ri mo
108a3(mdo sde): mkhan gso sbyin gyi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi g.yon phyogs su ni dpal gyi lha mo'i gzugs bri/ sangs rgyas kyi g.yas phyogs su ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bdag
108a4(mdo sde): bu smad dang 'khor du bcas par bris te/ gnas der bkram nas/ me tog sna tshogs dang / dri sna mang po dang / mar me dam pa dang / zhal zas bda' ba sna tshogs kyis nyin mtshan rgyun mi
108a5(mdo sde): 'chad par mchod par bya'o/ / sngags 'di zlos pas sems mi g.yeng bar bya zhing / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang ba'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o// na mo shrI ka na thA ya/ bud+d+ha
108a6(mdo sde): ya/ na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ yak+Sha rA dzA ye/ ma hA dza ye/ i ta rA dzA ya/ na ma shrI mA hA de bI ye/ tad+ya thA/ ta ra ta ra/ tu ru tu ru/ ba ra ba ra/ su shud+ho su shud+ho/ ha na ha na/ ma ni ka na/ badz+ri
108a7(mdo sde): bai dz+rar+tha/ ku ka ti ke/ a lang kr-iti/ shau rA rA ya/ sarba saH/ gi na kA ma/ bai shra baNA/ shri ye de bI prab+hA ya/ ag+ni a hi/ mA bi la maH/ kun blan/ bar s+ya/ par s+ya/ da
108b1(mdo sde): hi ma ma/ dar sha na/ kA ma s+ya dar sha na ma ma ma/ man pra la dA ya swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngags zlos pa de dang / mchod pa rgya chen po mthong nas/ bdag byams pa dang /
108b2(mdo sde): dga' ba'i bsam pa skyes nas/ bdag de'i mdun du byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs sam/ yang na rgan po'am/ dge slong gi gzugs su byas te/ bdag lag na yid bzhin gyi nor bu gser
108b3(mdo sde): gyi snod dang bcas pa thogs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/ lus kyis gus pa ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tu brjod de/ sngags mkhan de la 'di skad ces smra'o// khyod ni
108b4(mdo sde): ci deng ci slong ba de dag thams cad grub par bya ste/ nags tshal dben par 'gro 'dod pa 'am/ mi mang po'i yod du 'ong bar 'dod pa 'am/ gser dang dngul la sogs pa'i nor 'dod pa'am/
108b5(mdo sde): sngags gzhan sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa'am/ rdzu 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa dang / tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang / sman bcud kyis len 'dod pa la sogs pa thams cad bsam pa bzhin/
108b6(mdo sde): du grub par bya'o// bdag gis dngos po de dag la sogs pa mdo tsam zhig smos par zad kyi/ de ma yin pa gzhan zhig 'dod na yang thams cad bsam pa bzhin du yongs su grub par bya ste/
108b7(mdo sde): rin po che'i gter mi zad pa dang / bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dper na nyi zla 'dis la ltung bar 'gyur ba dang / sa chen po 'di gzhan du 'gyur ba'i dus ni yod kyang
109a1(mdo sde): srid kyi/ bden pa'i chog 'di ni nam kyang slu bar mi 'gyur bas/ rtag tu bde ba dang / yid bzhin du skyid pa longs spyod pa thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bcom
109a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di gang zhig 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing 'don pa yang rung / sngags 'di grub pa yang rung ste/ tshegs chung ngus myur du grub par 'gyur ro// bcom
109a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag gis sems can dbul zhing 'phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams kyi ched du sngags 'di bshad pas/ des phyug cing bde ba'i mchog dang phun sum tshogs pa tshe gcig
109a4(mdo sde): tu 'byor par 'gyur ro/ / bdag gis kyang de yongs su bsrung zhing bskyab pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang zhing gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o// gzhan yang gser
109a5(mdo sde): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de 'dzin tsang rgyas par byed pa dang / sngags 'di 'chang ba'i gang zag de gom pa brgya tshun chad 'od kyis snang bar byas te/ bdag gi 'khor gnod
109a6(mdo sde): sbyin stong rnams kyis kyang / rtag tu de'i g.yog tu bgo zhing mngag gzhug yid bzhin du byed du gzhug go/ bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'di slu ba med par yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs su
109a7(mdo sde): gsol/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus sngags de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so legs so zhes bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sems
109b1(mdo sde): can thams cad sred pas gdungs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dra ba thams cad drang bas phyug cing bde bar bya ba'i byor/ sngags 'di smras pa dang / gzhan yang mdo sde 'di 'jig rten du yongs su
109b2(mdo sde): rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ sngags 'di bshad pa ni legs so legs so// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
109b3(mdo sde): lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ de'i tshe mngon sum du tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom
109b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ / rgyal ba zla ba dri ma med pa'i sku// rgyal ba nyi ma 'od zer stong gi 'od// rgyal ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i spyan// rgyal ba me tog pad rtsa rdul med tshem/
109b5(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu ste// rin po che ni du ma'i 'byung gnas gyur// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes chu yi sa gang // ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong gis kun tu gang // rgyal ba'i zhabs ni
109b6(mdo sde): 'khor los bris 'dra ste/ / khor yug mu khyud de bzhin rtsib ma stong // phyag dang zhabs ni dra bas spras pa ste// zhabs kyi dra ba dang pa'i dbang po bzhin// gser gyi ri bo lta bur rab tu gdas
109b7(mdo sde): rgyal ba dri med gser gyi ri dbang rgyal/ / yon tan thams cad ri dbang 'dra ba ste// sangs rgyas ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zla ba chu zla 'dra// nam mkha' dang
110a1(mdo sde): yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste/ / sgyu ma mig sgra lta bur chags med pa// rgyal ba dri ma med la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la
110a2(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ stobs bcu dag gis gser 'od dam pa yi// mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po rab mchog 'di// 'jig rten skyong ba khyed cag rnams kyis ni// brtson
110a3(mdo sde): 'grus rab tu brtan pas bskyang bar bya/ / 'di ltar mdo sde'i dkon mchog zab mo 'di// sems can kun la bde ba sbyin byed pa// sems can rnams la phan dang bde ba'i phyir// 'dzam
110a4(mdo sde): bu'i gling 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur/ / 'di ltar stong gsum gyi ni stong chen gyi// 'jig rten dag na ngan song sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi no//
110a5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa yin// 'dzam gling 'di na 'dzam gling gnas pa yi// rgyal po gang dag yin pa thams cad kyis// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas ni// chos
110a6(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni yul dag bskyang bar gyis/ / gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir bde ba dang // shin tu lo legs nyams kyang dga' 'gyur zhing // 'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad dag na
110a7(mdo sde): yang / / sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba gyis// 'di ni mi yi dbang po gang rnams ni// yul la dga' dang bdag bde dga' ba dang // rgyal srid rnam par 'byor pa dga' ba
110b1(mdo sde): des/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'di na mnyan par bya// mdo sde'i dbang 'di mchog tu dge bar byed// pha rol dgra ni yang dag zad par byed// pha rol dmag tshogs zlog byed dge ba byed//
110b2(mdo sde): mchog tu 'jigs pas 'phongs pa sel bar byed// dper na rin chen shing ljon rab mdzes pa// yon tan kun 'byung khyim na yod pa ltar// rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis
110b3(mdo sde): kyang / / mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de ltar blta// dper na chu grang skom pa sel byed pa// tshabs nyam thag tshe ni rnyed pa ltar// yon tan dag gis skom pa'i rgyal po la// mdo
110b4(mdo sde): sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no/ / dper na rin chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// rin chen snod ni lag mthil yod pa ltar// mo yi dbang po'i tshogs la gser 'od mchog
110b5(mdo sde): mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no/ / 'di ni lha yi tshogs kyis mngon mchod pa// mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyag byas pas// 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po pa// bzhi po
110b6(mdo sde): dag gis kun tu bsrungs pa yin/ / phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang // mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni rtag tu dgongs// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni bshad pa na// sangs
110b7(mdo sde): rgyas rnams kyis legs zhes brjod pa byin/ / gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis// phyogs bcu dag tu yul yang srung bar byed// rab tu dbang zhing rab tu mgu sems kyis// mdo sde
111a1(mdo sde): dbang po 'di ni mnyan par byed/ / 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas par gyur pa yi// lha yi tshogs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga'
111a2(mdo sde): bas/ / mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed// chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'di yis na// gzi brjid dang ni stobs dang brtson 'grus thob// gzi byin chen po yis ni lha yi lus// shin
111a3(mdo sde): tu rgyas shing rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos pa dang / ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar
111a4(mdo sde): gyur/ dga' bar gyur te/ de dag chos kyi shugs yud tsam zhig dus nas mchi ma phyis te/ de dag lus 'phar yan lag 'dar zhing dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba bsam
111a5(mdo sde): gyis mo khyab pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man+da ra ba dag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor to// mngon par gtor nas kyang / stan rnams las
111a6(mdo sde): langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan
111a7(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi re re la yang gnod sbyin lnga lnga brgya dang / chos smra ba de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su
111b1(mdo sde): bskyang ba'i slad du/ rtag tu dge slong chos smra ba'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o// gal te mdo sde 'di las tshig gi don 'ga' zhig brjed par gyur na yang / bdag cag gis de la
111b2(mdo sde): dran pa dang / mi brjed pa'i mchog gi gzungs chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di dag gang na bzhugs pa'i gnas de dag gi sems can rnam
111b3(mdo sde): kyis yongs su rgyas par byed pas/ nams kyang nub par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa de dag la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sems can de
111b4(mdo sde): dag gis ye shes dang / spobs pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa thob pas/ nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i bde ba dang ldan te/ bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas shing
111b5(mdo sde): 'khor ba yongs su spangs te/ bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen po bzhis
111b6(mdo sde): yul 'khor yongs su skyong ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa
111b7(mdo sde): ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni// byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la bsgoms pa rnams kyi ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon
112a1(mdo sde): kyi spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su 'dzin pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i'o
112a2(mdo sde): bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gzungs ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs gzungs zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chog gi
112a3(mdo sde): don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'o bu ji ltar khyod theg pa chen po glanas
112a4(mdo sde): pa dang / theg pa chen po la mos pa dang / theg pa chen po la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin na/ shA ra dA ti'i bu ji ltar khyod gzungs ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas shing / chos kyang
112a5(mdo sde): ma yin/ chos ma yin pa yang ma yin/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin/ dngos po can yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa can yang
112a6(mdo sde): ma yin/ rkyen las byung ba yang ma yin/ rkyen med pa las byung ba yang ma yin/ 'gro ba las byung ba yang ma yin/ 'gro ba med pa las byung ba yang ma yin/ chos gang gi skye ba yang ma
112a7(mdo sde): yin/ 'gog pa yang ma yin par chos ston mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims
112b1(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas kyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs sgrub pa'i lam gyi/
112b2(mdo sde): rigs pa dang / stobs kyi gnas ston pa legs so legs so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//
112b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ gzungs thob pas gang la gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang yang dag par
112b4(mdo sde): dam bcas par 'gyur ba dang / rten med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyi spobs pa can gyi slob dpon dang / lam la shin tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad du
112b5(mdo sde): gsol/ bde bar bshegs pa bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'o
112b6(mdo sde): bu legs so legs so/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la sangs rgyas nyi du brjod par bya ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang la la gzungs thob pa'i byang
112b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la bkur stir byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / rim gror byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa des/ sangs rgyas la bkur stir byas par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i
113a1(mdo sde): bu gang gzungs 'di nyan par byed pa dang / gang dag gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa dang / gang dag mos par byed pas de rnams la byang chub kyi sems dpa' dang ma bral//
113a2(mdo sde): bas/ sangs rgyas la ji ltar mchod pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs de ni 'di yin te/ tad+ya thA/ san d+hA ra ni/ ud d+hA rA ni/ su sa ma pra tiSh+To te/ su na ma/ su pra
113a3(mdo sde): tiSh+Thi te/ bi dzA ya ba lA/ sad tu pra ti/ su a ro hA/ dz+nyA na pra ti/ ud pA da ni/ a ba nA ba ni/ a b+hi ShI ni/ a b+hi byA hA ra/ shu b+ha bste/ su ni shri tA/ ba hu gum b+hA/ a b+hi pa dA
113a4(mdo sde): swA hA/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi chog 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang gis shin tu gnas pa dang / legs par bzung ba byas nas 'chang bar byed pa de bskal pa'am/
113a5(mdo sde): bskal pa bas lhag pa 'am// bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang smon lam zad par mi 'gyur la/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur te/ dug gis ma
113a6(mdo sde): yin zhing sbrul gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu chags pa med pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas
113a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi yum/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum ste/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag gis stong
113b1(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa phrag bcu rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yon du phul zhing / sangs rgyas bcom
113b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das de rnams la bskal pa grangs med par na bza' dang / zhal zas kyi nom pas bzhugs par byed pa bas/ gang dag gis chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
113b3(mdo sde): la tshig gcig tsam 'dzin par byed pa'i sems can de dag de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la chags pa med pa'i
113b4(mdo sde): gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum yin no// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i le'u
113b5(mdo sde): ste bcu gsum pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis glog thams cad bzlog pa
113b6(mdo sde): so sor 'brang ba sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/ nga yang da ltar 'chad kyis zung zhig/ kun dga' bo shar phyogs na 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i glog yod//
113b7(mdo sde): kun dga' bo lho phyogs na skad brgya pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo nub phyogs na 'od nyams pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo byang phyogs na rgyun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i
114a1(mdo sde): glog yod do/ / kun dga' bo gang la la glog 'di rnams kyi mang shes pa dang / phyogs rnam par gnas pa shes pa de la/ glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung
114a2(mdo sde): bar shes par bya'o/ / glog gi ming 'di dag yi ger bris te/ gnas gang dag tu bzhag pa'i gnas de dag tu/ glog thams cad mi 'bab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
114a3(mdo sde): tshe/ drA bi Da'i sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gi bka' stsal to// tad+ya thA/ ni mi ni ma/ ni ma ni d+ha ri/ 'jig rten gsum snang bar byed pa/ lag na rtse gsum pas phyogs 'dir glog tham
114a4(mdo sde): cad bdag la srungs shig/ srungs shig swA hA/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spun ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/
114a5(mdo sde): 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/ drA ba Da'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod
114a6(mdo sde): par bgyi'o/ / tad+ya thA/ ka Te be ka Te/ ni ka Te/ pra t+yaR+ShI ke/ pra t+ya mi tre/ shud d+he/ mu ga te/ bi ma le/ pra b+ha sA ra/ an Da re/ pan Da re/ shwe te/ pan Da ra/ bAs
114a7(mdo sde): ni/ ha ri kan Da ri/ ka pi li/ ping+ga la/ ak+Shi da d+hi mu khi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag la srungs shog srungs shig srungs shig/ 'phags pa spyan ras
114b1(mdo sde): gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis/ bdag dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad mthong bar ma gyur cig swA hA/ de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das pa/
114b2(mdo sde): la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi chog rnams
114b3(mdo sde): brjod par bgyi'o/ / tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni/ mu nin d+ha re/ ma ti me ti/ su ma ti/ ma hA ma hA/ ha ha ha ha/ khyod la sdig pa med kyis/ ma 'jigs shig ces lag na rdo rjes smras
114b4(mdo sde): kyis drA bi Da swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsrung ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di su'i snying la 'dzin tam/ yi ger bris pa de bdag gos rtag par rgyun du 'jigs pa thams cad
114b5(mdo sde): las bsrung bar bgyi'o/ / dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las thar par bgyi'o// de nas mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
114b6(mdo sde): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba bskyed pa'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags
114b7(mdo sde): kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ / tad+ya thA/ hi li mo li/ rtsi ma sAH/ za h+ma pu re swAhA/ brah+mas re sAH/ brah+ma b+hi su gar+b+he/ pushwa sam sta re swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
115a1(mdo sde): ni bdag gi bsrung ba tshangs pa'i chad pa zhes bgyi ba ste/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi
115a2(mdo sde): par bgyid pa lags so/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
115a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ bi ni ba ra ni/ ban d+ha/ ma ni nai te
115a4(mdo sde): ti ni gau ri/ ga na d+ha ri/ tsa na Da li/ ma tang gi/ puk+ka se/ sa la pra b+he/ h+ni mi ma t+yo ta ma/ ud tA ra ni/ ma ho ra ni/ ma ho ra ni/ d+ha ra Ni ge tsa kra bA ke/ sha ba ri sha ba rau sAt+ma/
115a5(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni/ bdag gi rig sngags rdo rje'i lce 'beb pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par bgyid pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las
115a6(mdo sde): yongs su skyob pa lags so/ / de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das
115a7(mdo sde): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang / skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po
115b1(mdo sde): la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi chog rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ push+le su pu shwe/ dum pa ri hA re/
115b2(mdo sde): Ar+ya pu sha ste/ shAn ti ni mug te mang ga l+ya/ hi rat+na gar+b+he stu ste/ sta bi te swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi bsrung ba 'jigs pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi
115b3(mdo sde): ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las mi 'jigs par bgyid pa/ tshe skyong ba dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang
115b4(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/
115b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsrung ba chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba/ glog thams cad zlog pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum
115b6(mdo sde): pa thams cad sel ba/ dug rnams mi gdug par bgyid pa/ gshed byed dang / byad stems dang / ro langs dang / bkra mo shes pa'i 'jigs ba zhi par bgyid pa mchis na/ bcom
115b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'di nas dbyung ba dang / ser sna spang ba'i slad du/ thugs brtse bar dgongs te bzhes su gsol/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
116a1(mdo sde): cag klu rnams nams ni ser sna can te/ sems ser snas bskor ba lags so// tad+ya thA/ a tsa le/ a ma le/ ama? te/ a ka ye/ a b+hi ye puN+ye/ ba t+yab te
116a2(mdo sde): sarba pA paM/ pra shA ma ni ye swAhA/ ar+ya pan du/ su ba ra ni ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi chog 'di dag skyes pa'am/ bud med gang la la lce la 'don nam/
116a3(mdo sde): ger bris pa de la/ glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad ma mchis par rig par bya'o// rtsa ba'i dug gam/ mche ba'i dug gam/ dbyig dug gam/ gang dag gzhan yang yan lag las
116a4(mdo sde): byung ba'i dug de dag gis de 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ / bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde bar gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
116a5(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / klu'i dbang po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ bzhin bzangs dag/ khyed skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang
116a6(mdo sde): po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rjes su bzung ba'i phyir/ drA bi Da'i gsang sngags kyi chog rnams bshad pa legs so logs so// phyogs rnams na gnyid
116a7(mdo sde): log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa rnams srung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa
116b1(mdo sde): dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / klu'i bdag po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
116b2(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do/ / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de
116b3(mdo sde): nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
116b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can bdag gis kyang / dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig brgyan pa'i slad du/ spobs
116b5(mdo sde): pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/ gzungs kyang stsal par bgyi/ nges pa'i tshig gis brjod pa kun tu gzhag par bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de la shes pa'i snang ba chen po bgyi// gse
116b6(mdo sde): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig 'ga' 'am/ yi ge gang yang rung ba dag gcig yongs su nyams par gyur tam bsgyud na/ bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i
116b7(mdo sde): nges pa'i sgra dang / tshig dang yi ge de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// ci nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don
117a1(mdo sde): gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzam bu'i glong na gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can du ma dag gis gser 'od dam pa
117a2(mdo sde): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos nas/ shes rab rno ba bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshe 'di la
117a3(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / srog la phan gdags pa dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / thabs sna tshogs rab
117a4(mdo sde): tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / bstan bcos thams cad la rab tu mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / bzo'i bgyi ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs par thob par 'gyur ba dang / bskyud pa ma
117a5(mdo sde): mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de dang / sems can chos nyan pa de dag gi don gyi slad du/ sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i
117a6(mdo sde): khrus kyi las brjod par bgyi ste/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / 'khrug slong dang / khrag khrug dang / rmi lam ngan pa
117a7(mdo sde): dang / log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byang dang ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ gang gis mkhas pa dag khrus bgyid du stsal ba'i sman dang sngags ni 'di dag ste/
117b1(mdo sde): shu dag giru wang sngoka dang // sha mya sham sha ri sha/ in+d+ra ha sta skal ba che// dzA ma shi tsa a ka ru// shi ro be sta sra rtsa'i bog/ ku gul ras sha la ki/ rdo breg lo ma rgya spos dang // tsan
117b2(mdo sde): ngan dang ni ldong ros dang / / gi'u wang bcas pa ru rta dang // gur kum gla sgang yungs kar dang // spyi mo sug sme lan la dang // nA ka ge ser u shi ra// 'di dag tshan mnyam bgyis nas// skur
117b3(mdo sde): ma rgyal la btag par bgyi/ / phye ma la ni sngags tshig 'di// lan brgya mngon par gdab par bgyi// tad+ya thA/ su kri te/ ka ma ta li/ na li dza na ka ra te/ hang kar te/ in+d+ra dza la
117b4(mdo sde): ni/ shaM kA ra dwe/ bshad de/ a brta ka/ sau ke na kutra ku/ ka be le/ ka be la ma ti/ shI la ma ti/ san skr-i/ d+hu d+hu ma ba ti/ shi ri shi ri/ sad t+ya s+t+ri te swAhA/ lcibs dkyil 'khor
117b5(mdo sde): bgyis nas ni/ / me tog sil ma bkram par bgyi// gser gyi snod dang dngul snod du// mngar ba'i khu ba gzhag par bgyi// skyes bu go cha bgos pa no// bzhi zhig der yang gzhag
117b6(mdo sde): bar bgyi/ / rab tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bzhi// bum pa thogs par gzhag par bgyi// rtag tu gu gul bdug par bgyi// sil snyan sna lnga bgyid du stsal// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa
117b7(mdo sde): dan gyis/ / lha mo de ni legs par brgyan// bar bar dag tu me long bzhag/ mda' dang mdung rtse sna sprad bzhag/ de nas mtshams kyang bcad par bgyi// de yi 'og tu dgos pa
118a1(mdo sde): brtsam/ / sngags kyi las ni 'di dag gis// mtsham bcad pa yang brtsam par brgya// s+yad la the dan/ a ra ka/ na ya ne/ hi li/ mi le/ ki le/ khi khi/ le swAH
118a2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su khrus bgyis nas/ sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na/ khrus kyis zhi bar sbyar ro// tad+ya thA/ sa ka De/ bi ga ta ba ti swA hA/ phyogs bzhi
118a3(mdo sde): dag na gnas pa yi/ / rgyu skar dag gis tshe srungs shig/ btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang // phung po'i las kyi 'jigs 'byung dang // 'byung po khams rnams 'khrugs bgyid
118a4(mdo sde): pa/ / 'jigs pa mi bza zhi gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ sha me bi sha/ me swA hA/ sa ga De/ bi ga De swA hA/ bi ga De be te swA hA/ sA ga ra/ sam bud+d+ha ya swA hA/ skan d+ha mA tA ya swAhA/
118a5(mdo sde): nI la kan thA ya swA hA/ a ba ra dzi ti/ bir+yA ya swA hA/ hA mi ban d+ha/ sam bud+d+hA ya swA hA/ a ni mai la bag tA ya swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ brah+ma ne/ na ma sa ra sA t+yaM/ ma hA de
118a6(mdo sde): sid d+h+yan tu mAM/ man tra pa dA/ ta ra tu btso te/ brah+ma nu ma nu t+ya swA hA/ dge slong chos smra ba de la bsrung ba dang / chos mnyan pa de dag dang / yi ger bris pa de dag gi don gyi slad
118a7(mdo sde): du/ khrus kyi las 'dis bdag nyid der mchi bar bgyi'o// lha'i tshogs thams cad dang lhan cig tu/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang der nad
118b1(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/ / ci nas dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi srog la phan gdags par 'gyu
118b2(mdo sde): ba dang / 'khor ba las 'byung ba thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag
118b3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / gza' dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / log
118b4(mdo sde): 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byad dang / ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dbyangs can la/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can khyod
118b5(mdo sde): skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te khyod kyis sngags dang / sman dang ldan pa'i chog 'di 'dra ba bshad pa ni/ legs so legs so zhes bya ba
118b6(mdo sde): byin te/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+yes lha mo
118b7(mdo sde): dbyangs can de bkug go/ / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can mchod 'os dka' thub che// 'jig rten kun tu rnam grangs mchog sbyin yon tan che// rtser gnas mdzes ma dur brtswa yis
119a1(mdo sde): gos bskus pa/ / dur ba'i rtswa yi gos gyon rkang pa gcig gis gnas// lha rnams thams cad lhags nas 'di skad tshig smras te// sems can rnams la
119a2(mdo sde): dge ba'i tshog shod lce khrol mdzod/ / sAd ya the dan/ mu re/ tsi re/ a ba dze/ a bA dza ba ti/ hing gu le/ ming gu le/ pid ga la ba ti/ ming gu She/ ma ri ts+yai/ sa ma ti/ da
119a3(mdo sde): sha ma ti/ a gri ta ma gr-i/ ta ra tsa/ ta ra tsa ba ti/ tsi ra tsi ri/ shi ri mi rau/ ma ri ts+yai/ pra na pri ye/ lo ka dze shwe lo ka shre sh+tse/ lo ka pri ye/ sid+d+ha br-i ba te/ b+h+r-i ma mu khi/ shuH
119a4(mdo sde): ri/ a pra tri ha ti/ a pra ti ha ta bud d+hi/ na mu tsau/ ma hA/ na mu tsau/ ma hA de byi/ pra ti grA hA/ na ma ska rA na/ bdag gi blo thogs pa med par gyur cig/ bstan bcos dang / tshogs
119a5(mdo sde): su bcad pa'i rgyu dang / sde snod dang / snyan ngag la sogs pa la/ bdag gi rigs sngags dngos grub tu gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ma hA pra b+ha wa/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ bcom
119a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das ma lha mo dbyangs can gyi mthus/ bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig/ kA ra te ke yu'u ra/ ke yu'u ra ma ta/ hi la mo'o// hi lo mo lo// sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang /
119a7(mdo sde): chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / dbang po'i bden pa dang / chu lha'i bden pas lha mo chen mo dgug par bya'o// gang dag 'jig rten na bden pa smra ba de dag
119b1(mdo sde): gi bden pa dang / bden pa'i chog gis lha mo dbyangs can dgug par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ hi li mi li/ bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo
