119b2(mdo sde): chen mo dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bdag la gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ de nas lha mo dbyangs can gyis gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag smras nas/ yang
119b3(mdo sde): bram ze ko'u di n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so/ / skyes bu chen po khyod sems can thams cad la spobs pa dam pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pa dang / shes rab che ba dang /
119b4(mdo sde): nor dang / dbyig la sogs pa sbyin pas phan 'dogs shing myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa legs so legs so// mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i mchog bstan pa'i phyir/ tshogs
119b5(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / gzungs 'di dang por su 'don pas// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal te// 'khrul pa med par bzlas byas na// dngos grub dam pa thob
119b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas rnams dang dam chos dang // byang chub rang rgyal nyan thos dang // tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // rgyal chen bzhi la phyag 'tshal zhing // rtag tu tshangs par
119b7(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / / rim gro gus pa ra bsam byas te// zhi la dben pa'i gnas su ni// sgra bskyed gzungs dang bstod pa brjod// ji snyed sangs rgyas lha klu la// mchod pa rgya chen bsham
120a1(mdo sde): par bya/ / skye bo'i rigs ni mang po la// snying rje'i sems kyang bskyed par bya// bcom ldan gser mdog mtshan rab can// rtse gcig sems kyis bsam bya
120a2(mdo sde): zhing / / bcom ldan gsung rab dam chos kyis// dbang po so sor nges mdzad pa'o// de yi tshig don legs bsams te// stong nyid bsgrub pa'ang gnas par byos// bcom
120a3(mdo sde): ldan thams cad mngon sum du/ / rtse gcig sems kyis bsam byas na// ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes dang // gzungs mchog dam pa thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan dpal mgur
120a4(mdo sde): gsung chos kyis/ / dam pa'i dbyangs des 'khor rnams 'dul// ljags kyis stong gsum khebs mdzad cing // so sor ci rigs ya mtshan ston// de lta'i gsung mchog dam pa
120a5(mdo sde): la/ / rtag par bsam zhing 'jigs pa spongs// bsam mi khyab pa'i ljags mtshan 'di// smon lam rgya chen dbang gis brnyes// chos rnams med par ston mdzad pa// ji ltar
120a6(mdo sde): mkha' la ma chags bzhin/ / sangs rgyas ljags mtshan gsung sgra la// de bsam smon lam tshad med 'grub// gang zhig dbyangs can mngon mchod dam// yang na slob bam man ngag
120a7(mdo sde): bzhin/ / lung bzhin chos de gang bsgrub pa// bkur sti mchog rnams thob par 'gyur// gang zhig ye shes mchog sgrub pa'ang // rtse gcig sems kyis chos 'di gzung // bsod nams
120b1(mdo sde): ye shes tshogs 'phel zhing / / nges par 'grub la yid gnyis spongs// gang zhig nor bsgrub nor ba sgrub nor ldan dang // khe dang grags pa'am de bzhin 'grub// 'byung bar 'dod
120b2(mdo sde): pa'ang rnam grol bar/ / nges par 'grub pas yid gnyis spongs// yon tan mang po tshad med pa'ang // bsam pa bzhin du kun 'grub pas// 'di la tshul bzhin gang gnas pa// nges par
120b3(mdo sde): 'grub pas yid gnyis spongs/ / dben par gtsang ma'i gos gyon te// dkyil 'khor ci ran byas pa der// bum pa rgyas pa bzhi bzhag ste// dus bzhin me tog bdug pas mchod//
120b4(mdo sde): ba dan gdugs dang lda ldi bre// phye ma byug pas rgyas par brgyan// sangs rgyas dang ni dbyangs can mchod// lha de mthong 'dod mthong bar 'gyur// dbyangs can lha mo de mdun du// zhag
120b5(mdo sde): bdun gsum du bzlas brjod de/ / gal te lha de ma mthong na// bsam pa brtan pas zhag dgur bzlas// de yi nub mo'ang ma mthong na// gzhan du shis pa'i gnas btsal te// tshul
120b6(mdo sde): bzhin lha mo'i gzugs bris la/ / mchod cing bzlas brjod rgyun mi gcod// bdag dang gzhan don tshad med la// nyin mtshan rgyun du brtson bskyed de// de yi 'bras bu gzhan la stobs//
120b7(mdo sde): des ni bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// de ste'ang bsam pa ma grub na// zla ba gsum dang drug dang dgu// yang na brtson pas lor bzlas na// mngon shes drug la sogs pa'ang thob// de nas
121a1(mdo sde): bram ze ko'u di n+yas de skad ces bshad pa thos nas/ dga' ba dang / rangs pa tshad med pa skyes te/ 'khor 'dus pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha dang mil
121a2(mdo sde): sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis/ sems ma g.yeng par bdag la nyon cig dang / bdag gis kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten te/ dbyangs can lha mo mchog la bstod pa'i phyir
121a3(mdo sde): tshogs su bcad de smra bar bgyi'o/ / phyag 'tshal lha mo mthu chen la// 'jig rten khams 'dir dbang brnyes par/ sngon gyi drang srong gis bshad pas// de phyir bdag gis khyod
121a4(mdo sde): la bstod/ / dpal ldan thugs ni bde ba dang // thos 'dzin mdzes ldan grags ldan pa// 'jig rten 'di skyed yum yang yin// rtag tu dpal la brtson chen spyod// g.yul gyi gnas/
121a5(mdo sde): las rtag tu rgyal// snying rje bzod la dul bas bskyed// gshin rje'i srong mos lus ston cing // rtag tu dar gos sngon po man pas// mdzes dang mi mdzes kun ston cing // spyan
121a6(mdo sde): mig su mthong sdang ba bskyed/ / spyod pa tshad med 'jig rten 'das// skyabs su su 'ongs rjes su 'dzin// bar 'ga' ri dang brag la gnas// bar 'ga' phug dang chu bo'i 'gram// /
121a7(mdo sde): yang na ljon sdong nags rnams su// gnas de dag ni lha mo'i rten// ji ltar ri brag mi rnams kyis// rma bya'i mdongs las gdugs byas shing // rtag tu lha mo de mchod na// thams
121b1(mdo sde): cad dus su 'jig rten skyob/ / stag dang seng ges 'khor byas shing // bya dang phyugs kyang de la brten// dril chen sgra dag mngon bsgrags pas// bin d+ha'i ro la grags par gyur//
121b2(mdo sde): phyag na tri shu la thor tsugs dbu// yang na nyi zla'i ru mtshon bsnams// zla ba mar ngo'i bcu gcig gam// dgu yi dus su mchod pa bya// g.yul 'gyed dus su thugs brtse bas//
121b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten kun la gzigs pa'i phyir// lha mo ba su'i gzugs ston pas// lha mo'i mchog de dpe med pa'o// phyugs rdzi rgan mo'i gzugs ston cing // lha dag 'thab pa'ang rtag
121b4(mdo sde): tu rgyal/ / yun ring 'jig rten bde bar gnas// bar 'ga' khros shing bar 'ga' zhi// bram zer smra zhing chos bzhi dang // rdzu 'phrul gsang sngags kun la mkhas// drang srong lha yi
121b5(mdo sde): dbang brnyes pas/ / sa chen 'di nas sa bon byed// lha mo 'du ba'i dus su yang // rgya mtsho lung bzhin nges par 'du// gnod sbyin klu la sogs rnams kyis// kun gyi gtso byed 'dul
121b6(mdo sde): bar nus/ / mo rnams kun gyi tshangs spyod mchog/ 'jig rten gtso sbyin bdag la dgongs// rgyal po'i gnas na'ang pad+mo bzhin// chu bo la yang gru dang gzangs// zla ba nya bzhin zhal
121b7(mdo sde): yang rgyas/ / mang du thos ldan rten yang byed// ri bo'i rtse bzhin spobs pa 'phags// bsams pas gling dang rab kyang ston// lha min la sogs lha rnams kyis// kun gyis yon tan
122a1(mdo sde): bstod cing bsngags/ / spyod stong brgya byin lha rgyal yang // gus pa'i sems kyis zhal du lta// sems can gang dag ci 'dod pa// de kun bsam pa myur du skong //
122a2(mdo sde): myur thos pa 'dzin pa yang // sa chen 'di gnas kun gyi mchog/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams dag tu// rtag tu sgom chen snang byed bzhin// bya dang gcan gzan ri dgas kyi'ang //
122a3(mdo sde): kun gyi bsam pa yongs su skong // bud med kyi mchog ri bo bzhin// drang srong 'jig rten ring gnas bzhin// lha mo gzhon bzhin 'dod dang bral// mi mjed bdag bzhin bden par
122a4(mdo sde): smra/ 'jig rten 'thun par gzugs ston cing // 'dod khams bar gyi lha gnas su'ang // khyod ni lha mo'i gtso yin pas// de las mchog pa'i sems can med// gal te g.yul
122a5(mdo sde): dang 'jigs pa'i gnas/ / me yi dong du lhung gyur tam// chu bo g.yang sa mi rgod las// 'jigs pa de las sgrol bar mdzad// rgyal po'i chad pas bcings pa yang // yang na dgra
122a6(mdo sde): yis gsad par yang / / rtse gcig sems ni ma g.yos pa// sdug bsngal dag las thar par 'gyur// dge dang mi dge kun las skyob// byams dang brtse bas mdun du gnas// /
122a7(mdo sde): dephyir bdag ni sems btud de// phyag 'tshal lha mo chen mo la'o// de nas yang slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+yas/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag
122b1(mdo sde): gis mngon par bstod do/ / 'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad ngal nyon// lha dang dri za lha dbang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// bud med dam pa lha mo mchog gi rab gang yin// lha mo dam
122b2(mdo sde): pa mchog tu mdzes pa'i zhal la bstod/ / yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pas yan lag brgyan// dbyangs can zhes bya spun ni yangs shing bsod nams 'bar// dri med ye
122b3(mdo sde): shes yon tan rnams kyis rnam par brgyan/ / rin chen sna tshogs tha dad lta bur lta ba'i phyir// mchogs gang gi yon tan khyad par de bstod do// dam pa mchog gi dngos grub
122b4(mdo sde): byed pa dang / / yang dag sngags pa yon tan byed pa dang // dri med mchog dang pad+ma 'bar ba dang // mig mchog dang ni mig gi dam pa dang // dge ba'i gnas dang dge ba mthong
122b5(mdo sde): ba dang / / yon tan bsam mo khyab pas brgyan pa dang // zla ba dang 'dra dri med me 'od dang // ye shes 'byung gnas dran pa dam pa dang // seng ge mchog dang mi la zhon pa dang //
122b6(mdo sde): lag pa brgyad rnams kyis ni brgyan pa dang // mda' gzhu mdung dang ral gri dgra sta dang // be con lcags kyu 'khor lo zhags pa bsnams// zla ba nya ba lta bur snang ba'i
122b7(mdo sde): zhal/ yid du 'ong ba'i ngag dang dbyangs snyan dang // shes rab zab mo dang ni ldan pa dang // dgos mchog sgrub byed sems can dam pa dang // lha dang lha min dbang pos mchod
123a1(mdo sde): pa dang / / lha dang lha min tshogs kun gnas brjod dang // 'byung po'i tshogs kyi gnas rtag mchod pa'i phyir// swA hA bdag cag lha mo 'di la phyag bya'o// bdag la
123a2(mdo sde): yon tan khyad par klung stsol cig/ dgos pa kun tu bdag la dngos grub gsol// dgra rnams khrod na bdag la rtag tu srungs// yi ge rdzogs shing tshig rgyas 'di dag ni// nang par
123a3(mdo sde): langs nas gtsang mar brjod par bya/ / bsam pa dang ni nor 'bru thams cad rnyed// dngos grub dge ba rgya chen thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze
123a4(mdo sde): ko'u di myal legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ khyod kyis sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir lha mo dbyangs can la bstod pa dang / dngos grub dam pa slong bas bsod nams tshad med pa
123a5(mdo sde): dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+yas bstod pa dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig gis lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la gsol nas/ yang 'khor de dag la smras
123a6(mdo sde): pa/ skyes bu khyod kyis lha mo dbyangs can spyan drang ba dang / de'i thugs rjes sgrub cing / tshe 'di nyid la spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / thos pa 'dzin cing shes rab chen po dang ldan par
123a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas shing / tshogs sbyor ba'i rgyan la gsa' zhing thogs pa med pa grub par 'dod pas/ bsam bde nges shing gus pa'i sems kyis
123b1(mdo sde): lha mo dbyangs can spyan drang ba'i chog 'di brjod par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' dang
123b2(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu'i sangs
123b3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag par bden pa'i gsung la gnas pa/ so so'i dbang po dang 'thun par bden pa ston pa la mi slu bar gsung ba bskal pa bye ba tshad med par yang dag par
123b4(mdo sde): bden pa'i chog rtag tu ston cing / gsung ba de dag la rjes su yi rang ngo // bden pa gsung bas ljags yang sa la ring ba bkram ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling dang / rgyal chen bzhi dang / stong
123b5(mdo sde): gcig dang / stong gnyis dang / stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / nyon mongs pa'i
123b6(mdo sde): gdung ba thams cad sel ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la lus btud de phyag 'tshal lo/ / ljags kyi mtshan dam pa de 'dra ba dang / bdag spobs pa tshad med pa dang ldan
123b7(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ phyag 'tshal bcom ldan dbyangs can mchog/ byang chub chen po dbyangs can mchog/ 'phags par nga rgyal dbyangs can mchog/ zung bzhi ya brgyad dbyangs can mchog/
124a1(mdo sde): bden pa bzhi gsung dbyangs can mchog/ yang dag gzigs dang dbyangs can mchog/ drang srong tshangs 'khor dbyangs can mchog/ lha mo dbu ma dbyangs can mchog
124a2(mdo sde): skem byed lha yang dbyangs can mchog/ gzi can klu yang dbyangs can mchog/ mtshan mo lha mo dbyangs can mchog/ rgyal chen bzhi po dbyangs can mchog/ de gnas lha sras dbyangs can
124a3(mdo sde): mchog/ rdo rje gsang bdag dbyangs can mchog/ khyab 'jug lha yang dbyangs can mchog/ lha mo b+he mo dbyangs can mchog/ tshogs bdag lha yang dbyangs can mchog/ dpal gyi lha mo
124a4(mdo sde): dbyangs can mchog/ dpal gyi blo gros dbyangs can mchog/ hi ri tshig 'chang dbyangs can mchog/ ma mo kun mchog dbyangs can mchog/ 'phrom mo yang dbyangs can mchog/ gnod sbyin
124a5(mdo sde): kun kyang dbyangs can mchog/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal po dbyangs can mchog/ bdag la las mchog kun gyis stobs// mtha' med dbyangs can mchog thob mdzod// slu med pa la phyag 'tshal
124a6(mdo sde): lo/ / rnam par grol la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dod chags bral la phyag 'tshal lo// bcings pa bcad la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam dag sems la phyag 'tshal lo// 'od snang mdzad la phyag
124a7(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ / bden tshig gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam sems la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor mang gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// dbyangs can lha la
124b1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ / bdag ni chog la thogs med mdzod// bdag gi bsam pa ci mchis pa// thams cad myur du grub par mdzod// nad med rtag tu bde ba dang // tshe ring ba yang thob par shog/
124b2(mdo sde): rig pa'i gnas la mkhas pa dang // byang chub lam la brtson pa dang // skye bo kun la phan mang mdzod// re ba thams cad myur du skongs// bdag gi yang dag bden tshig dang // bdag gis
124b3(mdo sde): ma slu tshig smras pa/ / dbyangs can lha mo mchog gis ni// bdag gi don de grub par mdzod// lha mo 'dir ni gshegs par gsol// bdag gi chog la thogs med mdzod// lus dang
124b4(mdo sde): ngag la myur zhugs shing / / yid myur spobs pa rdzogs par mdzod// bdag gi lce yi dbang po la// bde gshegs spobs pa ldan par mdzod// tshig gi gzi brjid mthu des ni// sems
124b5(mdo sde): can thams cad 'dul bar mdzod/ / bdag gis tshig ni ci smras pa// don de thams cad grub par shog/ tshig la thams cad gus bskyed cing // byed pa thams cad chud ma gson// nam
124b6(mdo sde): zhig bdag gi spobs 'dod pa/ / don de grub par ma gyur na// lha mo khyod kyi bden tshig ni// thams cad brdzun pa nyid du 'gyur// mtshams med lnga yi sdig bgyis pa// sangs rgyas
124b7(mdo sde): bka' ni 'dul bar 'gyur/ / gang yang dgra bcom pa dag dang // byas pa gzo ba'i chog rnams dang // shA ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal dang // bcom ldan 'khor gyi gtso bo ste// de la sogs
125a1(mdo sde): pa'i bden tshig kyang / / thams cad bdag la grub par shog/ sangs rgyas nyan thos 'khor rnams dang // bdag gis dang 'dir spun 'dren gyis// bdag gi re ba
125a2(mdo sde): bskang ba'i phyir/ / thams cad myur du gshegs par mdzod// yang dag bden pa'i tshig gsol pa// thams cad slub med par shog/ srid pa'i rtse mo man chad dang // gtsang ma'i gan
125a3(mdo sde): ni thams cad dang / tshangs pa tshangs chen mdun 'don dang // tshangs pa'i rgyal 'khor thams cad dang // stong gsum 'khor ba'i bar dag dang // mi mjed 'jig rten gtso bo dang //
125a4(mdo sde): de dang de yi 'khor rnams dang // de kun deng 'dir spyan drangs te// thugs rjes bdag la dgongs mdzad cing // brtse ba kun gyis gzung bar mdzod// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha dag/
125a5(mdo sde): dang / gzhan yang 'phrul dga'i lha dag dang // byams pa mngon par 'tshang rgya'i gnas// dga' ldan gnam gyi lha rnams dang // 'thab bral gyi ni lha rnams dang // sum cu rtsa gsum lha/
125a6(mdo sde): rnams dang // rgyal chen bzhi yi lha rnams dang // gzhan yang lha 'khor thams cad dang // sa chu me rlung lha dag dang // ri rab lhun la gnas pa dang // chu bdun ri bo lha rnams dang //
125a7(mdo sde): de kun 'khor dang bcas pa dang // zur phud lnga can nor rgyas dang // nyi zla gza' dang rgyu skar dang // de la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang // 'jig rten bde bar mdzad pa'i gnas// de la
125b1(mdo sde): sogs pa'i lha thams cad/ / sdig pa'i las lam mos pa// sangs rgyas la gus 'byung po'am// gu rab gzhan la byams pa dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin rnams// dri za dang ni
125b2(mdo sde): lha ma yin/ / gzhan yang mi 'am ci dag dang // lto 'phye che la sogs pa rnams// kun kyang bcom ldan mthu yis ni// bdag gis deng 'dir spyan drangs te// thugs rjes brtse ba'i
125b3(mdo sde): dgongs pa yis/ / bdag la thogs med spobs pa bskyed// lha dang mi rnams thams cad kyis// gzhan gyi sems rig mkhyen pa rnams// kun gyi mthu yis byin brlabs shing //
125b4(mdo sde): bdag la spobs pa mchog stsol cig/ ji snyed nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs shing // chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'o// sems can de dag thams cad kyis// bdag la spobs
125b5(mdo sde): pa'i mchog stsol cig/ de nas dbyangs can lha mo la// bram ze ko'u di n+yas de skad ces gsol pa dang / lha mos skyes bu chen po de la dge'o zhes smras te/ gang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
125b6(mdo sde): kyokyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis tshogs su bcad pas bstod pa dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag 'chang zhing 'dzin pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ste/ sems 'dun
125b7(mdo sde): pas rjes dmigs shing / ci 'dod pa'i don cho ga bzhon du bsgrubs na/ chud za bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po shin tu phra zhing zab
126a1(mdo sde): pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa de bsam pa thams cad myur du 'grub par 'gyur te/ sems g.yeng bas byas pa ni ma gtogs//
126a2(mdo sde): so// de skad ces smras pa dang / bram ze ko'u di n+ya rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ thal mo sbyar ba byas nas rjes su 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha
126a3(mdo sde): mo dbyangs can la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ lha mo khyod kyis dam pa'i chos 'di yongs su bsrung zhing yongs su rgyas par bya ba dang / mdo 'di 'dzin pa'i sems can thams
126a4(mdo sde): cad la chos 'di lta bu bstan pas bde ba dang / bsod nams dang / spobs pa tshad med pa 'phel bar 'gyur te/ gang sems skyed pa rnams kyang myur du bla na med pa yang dag
126a5(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byas pa legs so legs so/ / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po las/ lha mo dbyangs can gyi le'u zhes bya ste bco lnga pa'o// /
126a6(mdo sde): / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dpal bdag gis ci nas kyang / chos smra ba
126a7(mdo sde): dge slong de yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / brel 'phongs pa ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / sems rtas par thob par 'gyur ba dang / sems bde bar
126b1(mdo sde): gdugs mtshan bas par 'gyur ba dang / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig dang yi ge rnam pa tha mi dad pa dag chub par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par rtogs par
126b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par brjod par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
126b3(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing / myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
126b4(mdo sde): po 'di nyen par 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / mu ge ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / lo legs par 'gyur
126b5(mdo sde): ba dang / sems can rnams kyang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na med
126b6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug
126b7(mdo sde): bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / sman zong dang / yo byad dang // 'tshog
127a1(mdo sde): chas kyi bye brag gzhan dag gis kyang dge slong chos smra ba de spro bar bgyi'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
127a2(mdo sde): me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUR+Ya dang / gser gyi ri kha dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de la/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do// des da ltar phyogs
127a3(mdo sde): gang dang gang du sems pa dang / phyogs gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de dang der sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur/ zas
127a4(mdo sde): dang / skom dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram
127a5(mdo sde): dang / yo byad gzhan dag gis kyang mi 'phongs par 'gyur/ sems can de dag yo byad thams cad 'byor par 'gyur ro// lha mo chen mo dpal gyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa de la
127a6(mdo sde): mchod par bya/ spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa yang dbul bar bya/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming nas lan gsum brjod cing / de la spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog kyang byin la/
127a7(mdo sde): ro sna tshogs kyang byin na/ de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa la sa yi bcud dag rnam par 'phel// lha rnams rtag tu rab tu
127b1(mdo sde): dga' bar 'gyur/ / 'bras bu lo tog ldum sdong ljon shing rnams// lo tog shin tu sna tshogs rnams kyang skyes// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i mang brjod pa'i sems/
127b2(mdo sde): can de dag la/ lha mo chen mo dpal ni sems par 'gyur/ de dag la dpal chen por byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal lha mo chen mo la legs so zhes bka'
127b3(mdo sde): stsal te/ legs so legs so// lha mo khyod kyis sngon byas pa rjes su dran pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa/ sems can tshad med pa rnams la phan pa dang / bde bas pa na
127b4(mdo sde): 'dogs shing mdo sde'i yang yongs su rgyas par byed pa'i bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ lha mo dpal
127b5(mdo sde): gyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu drug pa'o/ / // de nas lha mo dpal chen mos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la 'di nas byang phyogs
127b6(mdo sde): su mi ring ba zhig na/ lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i pho brang lcang lo can gyi 'khor na skyed mos tshal dam pa bsod nams kyi me tog 'od ces bya ba na/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang
127b7(mdo sde): bzangs pad+ma dam pa gser gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba na bdag gnas te/ mi gang la la zhig 'bru'i phung po spel bar 'dod pa des/ rang gi khyim phyag ba dar legs par bya/ khrus legs
128a1(mdo sde): par bya/ gos dkar po gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ gos rab tu dri zhom par bgo bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
128a2(mdo sde): ran chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUR+Ya dang / gser gyi ri kha dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal de la phyag 'tshal zhing / mtshan nas kyang lan gsum brjod/ lha mo chen mo dpal
128a3(mdo sde): gyi lag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos kyang dbul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang dbul/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
128a4(mdo sde): rgyal po'i ming yang lan gsum brjod/ bden pa'i tshig kyang brjod/ lha mo chen mo dpal la yang mchod cing me tog dang / bdug pa yang dbul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang dbul/ gser
128a5(mdo sde): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus/ de'i tshe lha mo chen mo dpal khyim de la sems par 'gyur/ de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro// lha mo chen
128a6(mdo sde): mo dpal 'gugs par 'dod pa des/ rig pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag dran par bya'o// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag
128a7(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
128b1(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par 'bar ba'i rin chen 'od zer snang ba'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gser gyi rgyal mtshan gser du snang ba la phyag/
128b2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser du snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma brgya'i 'od zer snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
128b3(mdo sde): pa gser rin chen 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
128b4(mdo sde): sgron ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog la phyag 'tshal lo// shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs kyi
128b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ / nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra la phyag
128b6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od dam pa la phyag
128b7(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu du la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags la phyag
129a1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' rab gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ rig pa 'di dag la sbyor bar bya ste/ rig sngags 'di bdag
129a2(mdo sde): 'byor bar gyur cig/ s+yad ya the dAn/ pra ti purda tsau ra/ sa man tA dar sha ne/ mahA bi hA ra ga ti/ sa man ta bi ma ni ga te/ ma hA kAr+ya/ pra ti pra ma ne satwA ar+tha sa mnatA/ nu pra
129a3(mdo sde): pu ri/ u yA na d+harmA tA/ ma hA b+ho ge ne/ ma hA mai tri/ u pa sang hi tau/ ma hA kl-i she/ su sang gr-i hi te/ sa mar thA nu pa la ni swA hA/ 'di dag ni spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o chos
129a4(mdo sde): nyid kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig gcig tu de kho na yang dag par grub sbyin pa mi slu ba'i don gyi chog ste/ sems can bar ma la spyod pa rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dag gis
129a5(mdo sde): lo bdun du 'don cing / 'dzin pa dag la yan lag brgyad pa'o bsnyen par gnas pa la bsnyen te/ bdag dang sems can kun thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs
129a6(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir/ snga dro dang phyi dro sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang spros rnams kyis mchod nas/ des bdag gi bsam pa 'di 'byor par gyur cig/ myur du 'byor par gyur
129a7(mdo sde): cig/ gtsug lag khang dang / dgon pa'i gnas kyang rung ste/ khyim de shin tu gtsang bar byas la/ lcibs dkyil 'khor byas te/ spos dang bdug pa yang dbul bar bya/
129b1(mdo sde): stan gtsang ma yang bting bar bya'o// sa la me tog gi sol ma bkram ste bsdad par bya'o// de nas skad cig de nyid la dpal lha mo 'ongs nas der gnas par 'gyur ro// de phyin
129b2(mdo sde): chatshachad khyim mam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas su nam yang brel cing 'phongs pa med par 'gyur ro// 'gron bu dang
129b3(mdo sde): gser dang / rin po che dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / yo byad thams cad 'byor pa dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'o rtsa ba gang dag byed pa de dag
129b4(mdo sde): thams cad las lha mod pal la shes kyi mchog sbyin par byas te/ de nas de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de na gnas par 'gyur/ 'phongs par mi 'gyur/ de dag gi bsam pa thams
129b5(mdo sde): cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis nor yongs su spel ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun
129b6(mdo sde): pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
129b7(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam/
130a1(mdo sde): brang 'khor gang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam
130a2(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor der btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
130a3(mdo sde): 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / sa phyogs gang dang gang na/ dge slong chos smra ba'i de'i chos kyi khri shom par 'gyur ba dang / gang dang gang du chos
130a4(mdo sde): smra ba stan la mchis nas/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par 'gyur ba der/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo
130a5(mdo sde): brten ma bdag phyogs de dang de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o/ / lus mi gda' bar chos kyi khri'i 'og logs su mchis te/ yan lag gi dam pa mgos dge slong chos smra ba de'i rkang
130a6(mdo sde): mthil nas brten par bgyi'o/ / bdag kyang chos mnyan pa dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/ yang dag par rim gror bgyi/ yang dag par mchod par bgyi'o//
130a7(mdo sde): bdag tshim par gyur/ rim gro bgyis par gyur/ rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ sa'i phung po dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad po 'di nas/ sa'i gzhi rdo rje la thug pa'i bar
130b1(mdo sde): du/ sa'i bcud kyis rnam par 'phel bar bgyi/ yang dag par rim gro bgyi/ yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// steng du yang rgya mtsho'i mtha' la thug pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di sa'i bcud
130b2(mdo sde): kyi snum gyis brlan par bgyi'o/ / sa chen po 'di rab tu gzi byin dang ldan par bgyi'o// de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal sna tshogs
130b3(mdo sde): rnams gzi byon dang rab tu ldan par 'khrung bar 'gyur/ kun dga' ra ba dang / nags tshal dang / shing ljon pa thams cad dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog
130b4(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs pa thams cad kyang / rab tu gzi byin dang ldan par bgyi/ dri dang rab tu ldan pa dang / snum dang rab tu ldan pa dang / ro zhim par 'gyur/ blta na rab tu sdug pa dang/
130b5(mdo sde): rab tu che bar 'gyur ro// sems can de dag kyang btung ba dang / bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs de dag 'tshal nas/ tshe dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang / dbang po rnam par 'phel
130b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ / gzi byin dang / stobs dang / gzugs dang rab tu ldan par gyur nas kyang / sa la mchis pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa 'bum phrag du ma dag bgyid par
130b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / brtson par 'gyur/ 'bad par 'gyur/ stobs su bgyi ba'i las rnams bgyid par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu des 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad zhi
131a1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang / lo legs pa dang / rgyas pa dang / nyams dga' bar gyur/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i glong gi sems
131a2(mdo sde): can thams cad bde bar 'gyur/ dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag gzi byin dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang / gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
131a3(mdo sde): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i slad du/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag chos kyi khro
131a4(mdo sde): stan la mchis pa'i gan du mtsha bar 'gyur/ mchis nas kyang sems rab tu dang bas sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
131a5(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi ba'i slad du/ chos smra ba de dag la gsol ba 'debs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan
131a6(mdo sde): 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rab tu bshad pa na/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag g.yog dang bcas te rab tu gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / rab tu stobs dang
131a7(mdo sde): ldan par 'gyur ro/ / bdag cag gi lus la stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mthu chen po skyed par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi byin dang / dpal dang / phun sum
131b1(mdo sde): tshogs pa yang 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par 'gyur/ gzi byin dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus
131b2(mdo sde): dang / mthu dang / shugs chen po thob par gyur na/ sa chen po dpag tshad stong phrag bdun pa'i 'dzam bu'i gling 'di sa'i bcud chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// sa chen po
131b3(mdo sde): gzi byin dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa la brtan pa'i sems can 'di dag thams cad kyang 'phel zhing rgyas la yangs par 'gyur
131b4(mdo sde): sa la gnas pa'i sems can de dag chen por gyur nas kyang / longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa sna tshogs la spyod par 'gyur/ bde ba dag myong bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad
131b5(mdo sde): bza' btung dang / btung ba dang / bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / gnas dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / skyed mos tshal dang
131b6(mdo sde): chu bo dang / rdzing dang / chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / mtsho dang / lteng ka dang / 'di lta bu'i yo byad bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa sa las 'byung ba/ sa la rten pa 'di dag
131b7(mdo sde): la spyod par 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu des na sems can de dag thams cad kyis bdag la byas pa gzo bar bgyi'o// gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo
132a1(mdo sde): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsti stang du bgyis te mnyan par bgyi/ bkur stir bgyi/ bla mar brgya/ rim gror bgyi/ mchod par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom
132a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang gi tshe sems can de dag chos smra ba de'i gan du mchi ba'i slad du/ rigs tha dad pa dang / khyim tha dad pa dag tu zhugs nas/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'o
132a3(mdo sde): rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur la/ thos nas kyang rang rang gi rigs dang / khyim dang / grong dang / grong rdal tha dad pa dag tu zhugs nas/ rang rang gi khyim na gnas pa dag phan tshun du
132a4(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bdag cag gis de ring chos mnyan pa zab mo thos so/ / de ring bdag cag gis bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ngo // bdag cag gis chos
132a5(mdo sde): mnyan pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag mnyes par byas so// deng bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis sems can dmyal ba las yongs su
132a6(mdo sde): thar to/ / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul las yongs su thar to// deng bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus
132a7(mdo sde): na/ tshe rabs 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i skye ba yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro zhes gtam zer bar 'gyur ro// khyim tha dad pa na gnas par 'gyur ba de dag sems can gzhan
132b1(mdo sde): dag la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na dpe gcig tsam brjod dam/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la tha na le'u gcig gam/ sngon
132b2(mdo sde): byung ba gcig gam/ tha na byang chub sems dpa'i mong ngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig gam/ tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshogs su bcad pa gcig gam/ tshig gcig gis
132b3(mdo sde): sems can gzhan dag la thos par bgyid dam/ tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mtshan gzhan dag la rab tu ston tam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang
132b4(mdo sde): dang gang na sems can rnam pa tha dad pa de dag phyogs rnam par tha dad pa dag tu mdo sde'i gtan tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta bu 'di dag gcig la gcig rjod dam/ thos par bgyid
132b5(mdo sde): dam/ gtam rgyud brjod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs de dag thams cad shin tu gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / shin tu snum par 'gyur ro// sa phyogs de dang de dag tu
132b6(mdo sde): sems can de dag thams cad kyi phyir/ sa'i bcud rnam pa sna tshogs dang / yo byad thams cad rgyas par skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ shin tu rgyas par
132b7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang bde bar 'gyur ro// nor che ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / sbyin pa la mos par 'gyur/ dkon mchog gsum la mngon par dad
133a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sa'i lha mo sems can
133a2(mdo sde): gang la la dag gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig gcig nyan na/ de dag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris
133a3(mdo sde): kyi nang du lha'i ris gang yang rung ba zhig tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ / sa'i lha mo sems can gang la la dag gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di dag la mchod pa'i phyir/
133a4(mdo sde): gnas de dag legs par brgyan par byed dam/ tha na gdugs gcig gam/ ba dan gcig gam/ ras bcos bu gcig gis g.yogs na/ sa'i lha mo rtag tu brgyan pa'i gnas de
133a5(mdo sde): dag 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris bdun po de dag tu lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang rgyan thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa dag tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe sems can de
133a6(mdo sde): ngag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang de dag tu skye ba de'i tshe/ sa'i lha mo rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang re re yang lan bdun du skye bar 'gyur
133a7(mdo sde): ro/ / lha'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang myong bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
133b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des na sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi khri stan la mchis pa de'i tshe chos kyi stan gyi 'og legs kyis phyogs de dang de dag tu gnas par bgyi'o/ / ci nas kyang
133b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas shing
133b3(mdo sde): myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
133b4(mdo sde): phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa myong bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
133b5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad
133b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur bar lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ dge slong chos smra ba de'i rkang pa la yan lag gi dam pa mgo bos brten par bgyi'o// de nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
133b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag la sngags kyi snying po zhig mchis pa 'di lha dang / mi thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba ste/ gang skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ 'khor bzhi po gang la la zhig gi/
134a1(mdo sde): bdag mngon sum du mthong ba 'dod pa dang / nor dang / nor bu rin po che dang / dbyig la sogs pa 'dod pa dang / sman bzang pos tshe ring zhing nad med par 'dod pa dang /
134a2(mdo sde): phas kyi dgra thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad 'jil bar 'dod na/ gnas dben par dkyil 'khor byas te/ khrus byas gos gsar pa bgos te/ rtswa bting ba'i steng du 'dug nas/ sku gzugs
134a3(mdo sde): ring bsrel can gyi mdun nam/ mchod rten ring bsrel can gyi mdun du me tog dang / bdug pa dang / zhal zas sna tshogs kyis mchod de skar ma rgyal dang sbyar ba'i tshes brgyad la sems rtse gcig gis gzung
134a4(mdo sde): sngags 'di bzlas par spyan drang par 'gyur te/ sngags la/ tad+ya thA/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ ku Tu ku Tu/ to Tu to Tu/ ba ha ba ha/ sha ba ri sha ba ri swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das
134a5(mdo sde): 'khor bzhi po gang la la zhig gis bdag spyan drang ba'i phyir/ sngags kyi tshig 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ bdag de'i gan du mchi bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das sems can gang la la
134a6(mdo sde): / zhig bdag dang mjal zhing smra bar 'tshal na/ cho ga snga ma'i tshul du bshams te/ sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ an tsa ni kya li k+Sha ni/ shi shi d+ha ri/ ha hA/ ha hA/ ku ru ba re swA hA/
134a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi tshig 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ sngags snga ma bzlas pa byas na/ de'i mdun du lus bstan te/ nges par bsam pa rdzogs par bgyi'o// gang sngags 'di
134b1(mdo sde): zlos par 'dod par/ sngar lus bsrung ba'i phyir/ sngags 'di brjod do// tad+ya thA/ ni shi ri/ b+ha sha ka ti/ da ti ku da ti/ b+hu ta/ b+hu ta/ b+hu te ri/ Ti Ti ba Ti/ ku ku Ti/ ga ba tsi/
134b2(mdo sde): li swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags 'di bsgrub pa'i tshe/ tshon skud sna lnga la sngags lan re gdab cing mdud pa re re bcing ngo // de 'dra bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags te/ dpung ba
134b3(mdo sde): g.yon pa la btags na/ 'jigs pa thams cad bsal te/ lus bsrungs par 'gyur ro// sems mi g.yeng bar sngags 'di bzlas na/ bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//
134b4(mdo sde): bdag gi tshig 'di mi slu bar/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams bdag la mngon du gzigs shing dgongs par gsol/ de nas
134b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo brtan ma la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ gang khyod kyi bden pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'dis mdo sde'i dbang po 'di dang / chos smra ba de la bsrung byas pa de ni legs
134b6(mdo sde): so legs so/ / de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i le'u
134b7(mdo sde): zhes bya ste bco brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te/
135a1(mdo sde): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom
135a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer ram
135a3(mdo sde): grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor gang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba der/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gnod sprin gyi sde dpon
135a4(mdo sde): chen po yang dag shes bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag dang lhan cig tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/
135a5(mdo sde): ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor der mchi bar bgyi'o// lus mi gda' bar bgyi ste/ dge slong chos smra ba de la bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba
135a6(mdo sde): dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo chos nyan pa de dag thams cad
135a7(mdo sde): dang / gang su dag gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las za na tshig bzhi pa'i tshogs su bcad pa gcig nyan pa dang / tha na tshig gcig gam/ tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde
135b1(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las byang chub sems dpa'i ming gcig gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig tsam thos par gyur te gzung ba dang / tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
135b2(mdo sde): rgyal po 'di'i ming thos par gyur te/ gzung ba de thams cad kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang /
135b3(mdo sde): bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu de dag dang / khyim de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / grong rdal de dag dang / dgon pa de dag dang / pho brang 'khor de dag kyang kun tu
135b4(mdo sde): bsrung bar bgyi'o/ / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun pa
135b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang gis bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes ming du chags par gyur ce na/ 'di ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mngon sum lags te/ btsun/
135b6(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad 'tshal to// chos thams cad yongs su 'tshal to// chos thams cad khong du chud do// chos thams cad ji snyed pa dang / chos thams
135b7(mdo sde): cad ji lta ba dang / chos thams cad gnas pa gang ba dang / chos thams cad gang dag lags pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rigs gang dag lags pa dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos
136a1(mdo sde): thams cad bdag la mngon sum mo/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag gi ye shes snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// ye shes kyi gsal ba
136a2(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / ye shes kyi rgyu ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// ye shes kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab bo// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad bdag gi ye shes kyi
136a3(mdo sde): yul 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag chos thams cad yang dag par 'tshal ba dang / yang dag par yongs su 'tshal ba dang / yang dag par rnam
136a4(mdo sde): par bltas pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa'i rgyu des na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes ming du chags so// btsun pa bcom
136a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig brgyan par bgyi ba'i slad du spobs par nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ / ci nas dge slong chos smra ba de'i lus mi ngal bar 'gyur ba dang / lus
136a6(mdo sde): kyi dbang po bde bar 'gyur ba dang / rab tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gi slad du sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du gser
136a7(mdo sde): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du yun du gnas shing / myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
136b1(mdo sde): po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu 'dzin par 'gyu
136b2(mdo sde): ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag myong bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par
136b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye
136b4(mdo sde): gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ de'i spu'i bu ga rnams su gzi byin stsal bar bgyi'o// de'i lus la mthu dang / stobs dang /
136b5(mdo sde): brtson 'grus chen po bskyed par bya'o// de'i ye shes kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab par bgyi'o// de'i dran pa khong du chud par bgyi'o// de cher spros par bgyi'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi
136b6(mdo sde): sde dpon chen po yang dag shes kyis 'di skad ces gsol te/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag la gzungs sngags zhig mchis pa 'di/ sems can thams cad la phyin pa dang / snying brtse ba'i
136b7(mdo sde): phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag nyid kyis sngags 'di 'don par bgyi'o// sngags la/ na mo bud+d+ha ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsang g+hA ya/ na mo brah+mA ya/ na ma in+d+ra ya
137a1(mdo sde): na maHtsa tur ma hA rA dz+nyA nunA/ tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ gau ri ma hA gau ri/ gan d+ha ri/ mahA gan d+ha rI/ dri mi Di/ ma hA dri mi Di/ dan Da lu khrun te/
137a2(mdo sde): ha ha ha ha/ hi hi hi hi hi/ hu hu hu hu hu/ ha le d+hi me/ gU d+ha me/ tsa tsa tsa tsa/ tsi tsi tsi tsi/ tsu tsu tsu tsu/ tsan De shA ri/ shi kha ra shi kha ra/ ud tiSh+Tha te b+ha ga bAnra/ sa bid dz+nyA ya sAhA/
137a3(mdo sde): gang la la zhig gis rig sngags 'di 'chang zhing 'dzin na/ bdag gis de la 'tsho ba'i yo byad bsod snyoms dang / gos dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / nor dang / rin po che la
137a4(mdo sde): sogs pa thams cad srul bar bya'o/ / gang la la zhig bu pho mo dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / rgyan la sogs pa'i yo byad 'dod na
137a5(mdo sde): yang / bdag gis de la yid bzhin du so sor stsal bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'di'i mthu dang / gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir/ gang gsang sngags 'di zlos pa'i tshe/ bdag
137a6(mdo sde): myur du de'i gan du mchis te ci yang thogs pa med par 'grub par bgyi'o/ / gsang sngags 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ thog mar gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen po yang dag shes kyi gzugs srid
137a7(mdo sde): chag bzhi pa 'am lnga pa/ lag na dgra sta thogs pa bris pa'i mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas pa'i grwa bzhir sbrang rtsi 'am bu ram chus gang ba'i bum pa bzhi zhog la/ byug pa dang /
137b1(mdo sde): bdug pa bsreg cing / me tog gi 'phreng bas kyang mchod par bgyi'o// yang dkyil 'khor de'i mdun du sbyin sreg gi thab khung brkos pa la/ dud pa med pa'i me'i nang du mar dang yungs kar
137b2(mdo sde): bsres la/ sngags lan re bzlas shing / thab de'i nang du sbyin sreg bya'o// de ltar lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs pa dang / bdag de la lus mngon par ston te/ khyod ci 'dod ces dri bar bya'o//
137b3(mdo sde): de nas sngags sgrub pa des kyang / ci 'dod pa de la spos shig dang / ci 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin par byed do// gang gser dngul 'dod pa dang / gter tshol bar 'dod pa dang / lha'i drang srong
137b4(mdo sde): 'dod pa yang 'grub ste/ nam mkha' la 'gro'o// gzhan yang lha'i mig dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa la sogs pa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyang thob par byed do// sems can
137b5(mdo sde): thams cad la yid bzhin du dbang sgyur zhing / nyon mongs pa thams cad la yid bzhin du dbang sgyur zhing / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rgyun bcad de/ rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ro//
137b6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ legs so legs so// gang khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan zhing
137b7(mdo sde): bde ba dang / dam pa'i chos 'di yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di smras pas/ bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde
138a1(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyal po las/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po yang dag shes kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas sa'i lha mo brtan ma zhes bya ba de/
138a2(mdo sde): 'khor mang po de'i nang na 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
138a3(mdo sde): gang yul 'khor na mi'i rgyal po byed pas yang dag pa'i chos mi spyod na/ yul gyi srid 'dzin cing sems can mang po la bde ba dang / rang gi lus rgyal thabs mthon po'i sa na yun ring por
138a4(mdo sde): gnas par mi 'gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje dang ldan pa rgyal po'i bstan bcos yang dag pas yul gyi srid ji ltar 'dzin pa bshad par gsol/ de thos pas mi'i rgyal po rnams
138a5(mdo sde): chos de lta bus 'jig rten skyong zhing / rgyal thabs dam pa la yun ring du gnas shing bde bar 'gyur ba dang / yul 'khor gyi skye bo de dag thams cad kyang yongs su bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas
138a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor mang po'i tshogs kyi nang na/ sa'i lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sa'i lha mo khyod de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon cig/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
138a7(mdo sde): dus na/ rgyal po stobs kyi dbang po'i tog ces bya ba la/ bu mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba de'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur nas ring por ma lon pa zhig na/ yab mchog gi rgyal po tog las blangs
138b1(mdo sde): pa/ rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba zhig yod de/ ngas rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig des/ lo nyi khri'i bar du rgyal po nyid byas par gyur te/
138b2(mdo sde): tha na sems kyis skad cig gcig tsam gyi ched kyang sngon chos ma yin pas/ phyogs 'ga' zhig la gnas par ma shes so// bu rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba de gang
138b3(mdo sde): zhe na/ de nas rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po stobs kyi dbang po'i tog ces bya bas rgyal po mdzes pa'i tog la/ rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba
138b4(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ / sems can kun la phan byed pa// the tshom thams cad gcod pa po// nyes byas thams cad 'jig byed pa// rgyal
138b5(mdo sde): po'i bstan bcos bshad par bya/ / rgyal po thams cad so so nas// dga' ba'i sems su 'gyur byos la// lha yi dbang po'i dam tshig kun// thal mo sbyar te nyan par byos// rdo rje'i
138b6(mdo sde): 'byung gnas ri dbang 'dir/ / lha yi dbang po 'dus pa na// tshangs dbang la ni dri ba'i phyir// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang langs// khyod ni lha gtso tshangs pa ste// khyod ni lha rnams
138b7(mdo sde): dbang phyug lags/ / khyod ni bdag cag the tshom gcod// bdag cag dog pa gcad du gsol// mir skyes pa yi rgyal po la// ji lta bur na lha zhes bgyi// gang gi rgyus na rgyal po la/
139a1(mdo sde): / lha mas shes ni brdzi bar gyur// sbrul ke la ni wA T+Ta/ myi mi 'jig rkyen 'dir ste nga // mi bdag gyur te ni rnams la// rgyal margyad ni bgyid par 'grur
139a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong bas tshangs dbang la/ / de skad yongs su dris pa dang // lha yi gtso bo tshangs pa des// 'jig rten skyong la 'di skad smras// da ltar 'jig rten skyong rnams kyis// de ltar
139a3(mdo sde): bdag la dris pa na/ / sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// bstan bcos dam pa kho bos bstan// mi yi gnas su skyes pa ni// rgyal po rnams kyi skye ba dang // rgyu gang gis na yul rnams
139a4(mdo sde): su/ / rgyal por 'gyur ba bshad par bya// lha dbang rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis// ma yi rum du 'jug gyur te// lha yis sngar ni byin brlabs nas// phyi nas mngal du 'jug par 'gyur//
139a5(mdo sde): mi yi 'jig rten skyes kyang ni// mi yi dbang por gyur pa yin// lha las skyes par gyur pas na// de ni lha yi sras zhes bya// khyod ni lha kun du yin zhes// sum cu rtsa gsum lha dbang gis//
139a6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i skal ba byin nas ni// mi rnams la ni dbang por sprul// nyes par byas pa rnams 'gog pa// chos ma yin pa gzhig pa dang // sems can legs byed dgod pa dang // lha yi gnas
139a7(mdo sde): su dgye ba'i phyir/ / mi yi dbang po mi shes dang // lha yi shes dang dri za'i shas// gdol pa'i shas dang srin shas kyis// nyes par byed pa zlog par byed// legs par bya ba byed rnams
139b1(mdo sde): la/ mi yi dbang po pha ma'i shas// rnam smin 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir// lha yis rgyal por byin gyis brlabs// tshe 'di legs par byas pa dang // nyes par byas pa'i las rnams
139b2(mdo sde): kyi/ / rnam smin 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir// lha yis rgyal por byin gyis brlabs// yul na nyes byas gnas pa dag/ gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor zhing // sdig pa can gyi skye bo
139b3(mdo sde): la/ 'thun pa'i chad pas mi gcod cing // nyes par byed pa yal bor ba// de tshe chos min shin tu 'phel// 'thab mo dang ni g.yo rnams kyang // yul 'khor der ni phyi phyir
139b4(mdo sde): 'byung / / sum cu rtsa gsum khang pa na// lha yi dbang po 'khrug par 'gyur// yul na nyes byed gnas pa dag/ gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor ba// de tshe g.yo ni mi bzang ba// drag po rnams
139b5(mdo sde): kyis yul 'joms 'gyur/ / pha rol dmag tshogs lhags nas su// yul 'khor de ni rnam par 'jig/ longs spyod rnams dang rigs kyang 'jig/ gang gi nor bsags yod pa yang //
139b6(mdo sde): g.yo byed rnam pa mang po yis// phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur// bya ba gang gis rgyal po nyid// bya ba de ni mi byed na// glang chen dbang pos rdzing bu bzhin// rang gi yul 'khor rnam par
139b7(mdo sde): 'jig/ ma rungs pa yi rlung ldang zhing // ma rungs pa yi char pa 'bab// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // gza' dang rgyu skar ma rungs 'gyur// rgyal pos yal bar bor na der// sa bon lo tog me
140a1(mdo sde): tog 'bras/ / legs par smin par mi 'gyur zhing // mu ge dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// yul na nyes byed gnas pa dag/ gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor na// de tshe
140a2(mdo sde): rnams khang pa na/ / yid ni dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// lha rgyal dbang po de dag kun// rgyal 'di chos dang mi ldan de// chos min phyogs la gnas pa'o zhes// phan tshun du ni smra bar 'gyur//
140a3(mdo sde): rgyal 'dis ring por mi thogs par// lha rnams 'khrug pa byed par 'gyur// lha rnams rab tu 'khrugs pa na// de yi yul ni rnam par 'jig/ yul du chos min 'byung 'gyur zhing // mtshon chas
140a4(mdo sde): kyang ni 'jig par 'gyur/ / g.yo rnams dang ni 'thab mo dang // nad kyang kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur// lha dbang rnams ni rab khros shing // lha rnams kyis kyang yal bar 'dor// yul 'khor
140a5(mdo sde): de ni 'jig par 'gyur/ / rgyal po de ni mya ngan rnyed// spun nam yang na bu yang rung // sdug pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur// sdug pa'i chung ma dang yang 'bral// yang na bu mo 'chi bar 'gyur/
140a6(mdo sde): skar ma dag kyang ltung bar 'gyur// de bzhin nyi ma 'dra ba 'byung // pha rol gyi ni dmag tshogs dang // mu ge shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur// de yi glang po 'phang pa dang // blon po 'phangs pa 'chi
140a7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ de yi 'og tu rnga mo ni// 'phadra ba dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur// khyim dang long spyod nor rnam kyang // phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur// yul yul du ni mtshon cha yis// phan tshun du ni 'deg par 'gyur// 'thab mo dag dang rtsod dang batsho
140b1(mdo sde): yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ / yul 'khor du ni gdon 'jug cing // mi bzad pa yi nad kyang 'byung // de yi 'og tu sbyin gnas kyang // chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur// de yi 'khor dang
140b2(mdo sde): blon po yang / / chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur// chos dang mi ldan skye bo la// de yi 'og tu mchod byed 'gyur// chos dang ldan pa'i sems can la// rtag tu chad pa gcod par 'gyur// chos dang
140b3(mdo sde): mi ldan skye bo bkur/ / chos ldan chad pas bcad pas na// der ni chu dang rgyu skar rlung // rnam gsum rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur// chos min skye bo bzung bas na// dam chos ro yi snying po mdang //
140b4(mdo sde): sems can mdangs dang sa yi bcud// dngos po rnam gsum rnam par 'jig/ skye bo ngan pa rab bkur cing // skye bo dam pa smad pas na// 'chi dang lce 'bab mu ge dang // rnam pa gsum ni der 'byung
140b5(mdo sde): 'gyur/ / 'bras bu lo tog ro dang mdangs// de yi 'og tu med par 'gyur// sems can nad pa mang po dag/ yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur// mngar zhing che ba'i 'bras bu dag/ yul
140b6(mdo sde): rnams na ni yod pa yang / / kha ba dang ni tsha ba dang // chung ba dag ni nyid dus 'gyur// rtse dang rgod dang dga' ba dang // sngan chad dga' ba'i dngos po dang // dga' ba nyams shing mi dgar 'gyur//
140b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs brgya yis rnam par 'khrugs// lo tog rnams dang 'bras bu yi// snum dngos khu ba zad pas na// lus dang khams dang dbang po la// de ltar tshim par mi 'gyur ro// sems can rnams
141a1(mdo sde): ni mdog ngan cing / / mthu chung shin tu ring bar 'gyur// kha zas mang po zos kyang ni// tshim par 'gyur ba ma yin no// stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus kyang // de yi 'og
141a2(mdo sde): tu med par 'gyur/ / sems can brtson 'grus nyams pa dag/ yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur// sna tshogs nad kyis gzir ba yi// sems can nad mang 'byung bar 'gyur// srin po sna
141a3(mdo sde): tshogs las gyur pa'i/ / gza' dang rgyu skar 'byung bar 'gyur// chos min phyogs la rab gnas te// rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pas// 'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor na// khams
141a4(mdo sde): gsum rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ / gang tshe rgyal po phyogs gnas te// nyes byed yal bar 'dor ba'i tshe// 'di 'dra'i nyes pa du ma dag/ yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur// lha dbang
141a5(mdo sde): rnams kyis dgongs gang phyir/ / rgyal po'i byin gyis brlabs pa yis// rgyal po nyid ni mi byed cing // nyes byed yal bar 'dor na ni// legs par byas pas sems can rnams// lha yi/
141a6(mdo sde): gnas su lhar yang skyes// nyes par byas pas yi dgas dang // sems can dmyal dang dud 'gror skye// gang tshe rgyal po yul rnams na// nyes byed yal bar 'dor ba'i tshe// sum cu rtsa
141a7(mdo sde): gsum lha gnas nas/ / nyes par byas pas ltung bar 'gyur// rgyal po nyid ni mi byed na// de ni bu yang ma yin la// lha yi rgyal po pa rnams kyis// gnas la nyes dang bcas par
141b1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ / g.yo ni shin tu mi bzad pas// gang tshe yul 'khor 'jig 'gyur ba// de phyir lha yi dbang rnams kyis// mi gnas rgyal po byin gyis brlabs// nyes par byas pa zhi bya'i phyir
141b2(mdo sde): legs par byed la 'dzud pa ste/ / tshe 'di la ni sems can la// yul gyi chos kyis don gyi phyir// rnam smin skyed pa rgyal po yin// legs byas dang ni nyes byas kyi// las kyi rnam par smin pa'i/
141b3(mdo sde): 'bras// rnam pa tha dad bstan pa'i phyir// byed pa gang yin rgyal por brjod// bdag gi don dang gzhan don dang // yul gyi chos kyi don gyi phyir// lha tshogs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs// lha
141b4(mdo sde): rnams dag kyang rjes yi rang / / yul 'khor dag na skye bo ni// sdig can g.yon can 'dul ba dang // yul gyi don gyi chos kyi phyir// srog dang rgyal srid rnams kyang btang // chos ma yin pa bzod
141b5(mdo sde): byed cing / / shes bzhin yal bar 'dor ba ni// yul na 'jigs pa mi bzad pa// de 'dra gzhan ni yod ma yin// ji ltar g.yo rnams 'byung ba la// g.yo byed chad pas ma bcad na// yul
141b6(mdo sde): du shin tu mi bzad pa/ / g.yo rnams phyir ni 'byung bar 'gyur// glang chen rnams kyis rdzing chen bzhin// yul 'khor de ni rnam par 'jig/ lha dbang rnams kyang khro bar 'gyur// lha yi
141b7(mdo sde): gnas ni rnam par 'jig/ yul du dngos po thams cad ni// ma rungs par yang 'gyur bas na// de phyir sdig pa byed pa rnams// nyes pa'i rim bzhin gdul bar bya// chos kyis yul
142a1(mdo sde): 'khor bsrung bar bya/ / chos ma yin pa spyad mi bya// srog kyang yongs su gtang bya zhing // nyes mgon bya bar mi bya'o// skye bo gnyen dang skye bo gzhan// yul 'khor skye sa
142a2(mdo sde): thams cad la/ / rgyal pos phyogs kyang gcig bya zhing // phyogs su ltung bar gyur ta re// rgyal po chos dang ldan pa yi// grags pa 'jig rten gsum gang ste// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas rnams na//
142a3(mdo sde): lha yi dbang po dgar gyur te// 'dzam bu'i gling ni nged kyi bu// 'di ltar chos ldan rgyal po yin// chos kyi yul 'khor der bstan nas// legs par 'byung la skye bo bkod// rgyal po de ni legs
142a4(mdo sde): byed pas/ / skye bo dag ni 'dir 'gyed de// lha dang lha yi bu rnams kyis// lha gnas gang bar byed snyam mo// chos kyi yul 'khor der bstan pas// rgyal po rnams ni rab tu dga'// lha dbang
142a5(mdo sde): rab tu dang 'gyur bas/ / mi yi rgyal po de la srung // nyi zla dang ni de bzhin du// rgyu skar legs par rgyu bar 'gyur// rlung yang dus su ldang 'gyur zhing // char yang dus su 'bebs par 'gyur//
142a6(mdo sde): lha gnas rnams dang de bzhin du// yul 'khor rnams su lo legs byed// lha dang lha yi bu rnams kyis// lha yi gnas rnams gang bar byed// de lta bas na rgyal po yis// bdag gis 'phangs
142a7(mdo sde): pa'i srog gtang gis/ / gang gis 'jig rten bde 'gyur ba// dkon mchog chos ni mi gtang ste// yon tan rnams kyis gang brgyan par// chos dang ldan pa bsten par bya// rang gi skye bos
142b1(mdo sde): rtag dga' ba/ / rtag par sdig pa rnam par spongs// chos kyis yul 'khor bskyang bar bya// chos kyang yang dag bstan par bya// legs par byed la sems can dgod// nyes byed las
142b2(mdo sde): ni bzlog par bya/ / gang tshe sdig pa byed pa rnams// tshul bzhin gdul bar byed pa'i tshe// yul 'khor du ni lo legs shing // rgyal po gzi brjid ldan par 'gyur// rgyal po grogs dang
142b3(mdo sde): ldan 'gyur zhing / / skye dgu rnams kyang bde bar skyong // gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu
142b4(mdo sde): pa'o/ / // de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang tshe 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur// de tshe rgya mtshor bcas pa'i
142b5(mdo sde): sa rnams dang / / gling bzhi rin chen gang bar bcas pa yang // sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la ngas phul lo// chos kyi sku de yongs su btsal ba'i phyir// gang sngon yid du 'ong zhing 'phangs pa yi// /
142b6(mdo sde): dngos po de dag ngas ni ma btang med// bskal pa du mar 'phangs pa'i srog kyang btang // ji ltar sngon gyi bskal pa bsam yas na// rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bde bar gshegs// mya ngan
142b7(mdo sde): 'das pa bde bar gshegs pa de'i/ / bstan la legs byung zhes bya'o rgyal po byung // de ni gling bzhi'i dbang phyug 'khor lo sgyur// rgya mtshor thug pa'i sa la rab tu ston// rgyal dbang
143a1(mdo sde): gsung phyir rgyal po'i pho brang na/ / de tshe rgyal po dam pa gnyid kyis log/ rmi lam du ni sangs rgyas yon tan thos// chos sgra rin chen sogs pa gnyid dkyil na// rnam
143a2(mdo sde): par lha de mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di/ / rab tu 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong bar 'gyur// rgyal po de ni gnyid kyis log las sang // de yi lus kun dga' bas khyab par gyur// mgu nas rgyal
143a3(mdo sde): po khab nas sngon byung ste/ / nyan thos dge 'dun mchog gi gnas su song // rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams la mchod byed cing // 'phags pa'i dge 'dun 'di ni rin chen sogs// yon tan ldan
143a4(mdo sde): pa'i dge slong gang yod ces/ / chos smra rin chen sogs pa kun tu dris// de yi tshe na rin chen sogs pa ni// phug gzhan zhig gi nang na 'dug gyur te// mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni rnams sems la//
143a5(mdo sde): kha ton byed cing bde bar rab tu 'dug/ dge slong chos smra rin chen sogs pa de// phun sum gzi brjid dpal gyis rab 'bar zhing // phug gzhan zhig gi nang na 'dug gyur pa// de yi tshe na rgyal po
143a6(mdo sde): de la bstan/ / 'di na chos sgra rin chen sogs pa 'dir// rgyal po'i spyod yul zab mo 'dzin pa ste// gser 'od dam pa zhes ni bya ba yi// mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po rtag tu ston// rin chen
143a7(mdo sde): sogs pa'i rkang la phyag 'tshal te/ / rgyal po legs par byung bas 'di skad smras// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal// zla ba nye ba'i zhal 'dra bshad du gsol// rgyal po
143b1(mdo sde): legs par byung ba de nyid la/ / rin chen sogs pas khas ni blangs pas na// stong gsum pa yi 'jig rten thams cad du// lha rnams thams cad rab tu dka' bar gyur// de tshe mi yi dbang
143b2(mdo sde): pos sa phyogs ni/ / gtsang zhing mchog tu khyad par 'phags pa des// rin chen chu dang spos chus chag chag btab// me tog sil ma bkram ste khri bshams nas// rgyal pos khri de gdugs dang
143b3(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang / / dar yug stong phrag du mas legs par brgyan// rgyal pos khri der tsan dan dam pa dag/ rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang mngon par gtor// lha dang klu dang lha min mi 'am
143b4(mdo sde): ci/ / gnod sbyin dbang dang gnod sbyin lto 'phye ches// lha yi me tog man da ra ba'i char// khri de la ni mngon par rab tu phab// chos 'dod lha ni bye ba khrag khrig stong // bsam gyis mi khyab gang
143b5(mdo sde): dag lhags gyur pa/ / rin chen sogs pa mngon par byung ba na// sa la me tog dag gis mngon par 'thor// chos smra rin chen sogs pa de nyid kyang // shin tu lus bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos
143b6(mdo sde): te/ / khri der nye bar song bar byas nas ni// thal mo sbyar ba byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// lha dbang dang ni lha dang lha mo rnams// bar snang 'dus nas me tog man+da ra'i// char pa 'bebs shing sil
143b7(mdo sde): sman brgya stong phrag/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag rab tu sgrogs// rin chen sogs pa dge slong chos smra des// phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas bye ba stong // bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dran byas
144a1(mdo sde): nas/ / de ni mngon par 'dzegs te 'dug par gyur// sems can kun la snying brtse bskyed nas ni// snying rje'i sems kyang yang dag bskyed byas te// rgyal po legs par
144a2(mdo sde): byung ba de la ni/ / de yi tshe na mdo sde 'dri bstan te// rgyal pos thal mo sbyar byas 'dug nas su// tshig gcig gis ni rjes su yi rang ste// chos kyi shugs kyis mig nas mchi ma byung // de yi lus
144a3(mdo sde): la dga' bas khyab par gyur/ / mdo sde 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// de tshe rgyal po legs par byung ba yis// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen rgyal po blangs// sems can rnams phyir smon lam
144a4(mdo sde): btab pa ni/ / rin chen bdun dang ldan pa'i rgyan rnams dang // gang yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can rnams// bde bar 'gyur ba'i nor bu rin po che'i// char pa de ring 'dzam bu'i
144a5(mdo sde): gling du pho ba/ / de yi tshe na rin chen sna bdun dang // dpung rgyan dang ni do shal rna cha mchog/ de bzhin zas dang skom dang gos rnams kyang // gling bzhi dag tu rab tu 'bab par 'gyur// rgyal po
144a6(mdo sde): legs par byung bas 'dzam gling du/ / rin chen char pa 'bab pa de mthong nas// gling bzhi rin chen gang bar bcas pa ni// rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bstan la phul// de bzhin gshegs
144a7(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub pa ni/ / rgyal po legs par byung zhes bya bar gyur// gling bzhi dag na rin chen gang bcas kyi// sa 'di de tshe nga yis yongs su btang // gang gis rgyal po legs par byung
144b1(mdo sde): de la/ / de tshe mdo sde 'di ni rab bstan pa// rin chen sogs pa chos smra dge slong de// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs der gyur to// ngas gang de tshe mdo sde 'di thos shing // tshig gcig
144b2(mdo sde): gis ni rjes su yi rang ste/ / ngas ni dge ba'i las ni de nyid dang // chos mnyan pa dang rjes su yi rang bas// gser gyi mdog dang bsod nams brgya yi mtshan// blta na sdug cing mig tu
144b3(mdo sde): mngon mdzes la/ / lha stong bye ba rab tu dga' byed pa// skye bos mthong na dga' lus rtag tu thob// bskal pa dag ni bye ba brgya stong phrag/ dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'khor los sgyur rgyal gyur//
144b4(mdo sde): bskal pa brgya stong du ma mang por yang // ngas ni khams kyi rgyal po myong bar gyur// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab brgya byin gyur// tshangs pa'i dbang po yid zhing de bzhin no// gang dag
144b5(mdo sde): tshad ni nam yang yod min pa'i/ / stobs bcu dpag med ngas ni mnyes par byas// ngas gang mdo thos rjes su yi rang ba// bsod nams phung po de ltar tshad med mang // bsam pa ji bzhin
144b6(mdo sde): ngas ni byang chub thob/ / chos sku dam pa yang ni ngas thob bo// kaser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// legs par byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// /
144b7(mdo sde): / dpal ldan lha me rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo dad pa la la zhig/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yo byad tham
145a1(mdo sde): cad kyis mchod pa chen po shin tu rgyus shing rgya che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa byed par 'dod cing / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
145a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul zab mo yongs su shes par 'dod pa des/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i phyogs kyang rung ste/ gang na gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i
145a3(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i sa phyogs der/ des gdon mi za bar g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis rna ba blags te/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
145a4(mdo sde): po 'di mnyan par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid 'khor la rgya cher brjod pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad
145a5(mdo sde): la/ / bsam yas mchod pa byed 'dod cing // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ba// zang mo rab tu shes 'dod pa// gtsug lag khang ngam gnas khang ngam// gang na gser 'od dam pa yi//
145a6(mdo sde): mdo sde'i dam pa 'di ston pa// sa phyogs der ni 'gro bar bya// mdo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste// yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pas// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho du ma las// sems can thams
145a7(mdo sde): cad thar par byed/ / mdo sde yi ni thog ma dang // dbus dang de bzhin mtha' ma mthong // mdo sde dbang po rab zab ste// 'di la dpe ni yong ma yin// gang+gA dang ni sa rnams dang // rgya mtsho dang
145b1(mdo sde): ni nam mkha' la/ / gnas pa'i rdul ni gang yang rung // dper bya bar ni mi nus so// chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa yis// de yi tshe na 'jug par bya// chos kyi bdag nyid mchod rten ni//
145b2(mdo sde): zab mor rab brtan gang yin pa// mchod rten de yi dbus na ni// rgyal ba shAkya thub pa mthong // yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis su// mdo sde 'di ni rab tu ston// grangs med bsam gyis mi
145b3(mdo sde): khyab pa'i/ / bskal pa bye ba ji snyed par// lha dag dang ni mi rnams kyis// bde ba dag ni rjes su myong // gang zhig mdo sde 'di nyan pa// de ltar bdag gi bsod nams kyi// phung po bsam
145b4(mdo sde): yas bsgrub snyam du/ / de tshe des ni de ltar shes// mes gang 'obs kyis bskor ba yi// dpag tshad brgya dag 'da' byed cing // tshor ba drag po bzod byas nas// mdo sde nyan par gang nus
145b5(mdo sde): pa/ / gtsug lag khang ngam gnas khang du// zhugs nas de ma thag tu ni// sdig pa rnams ni med par 'gyur// rmi ngan mtshan nyid thams cad dang // gza' dang rgyu skar gnod pa dang // byad dang
145b6(mdo sde): gdon ni mi bzad kyang / / zhugs nas de ma thag tu ni// thams cad gzhan du phyogs par 'gyur// klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis ni// rmi lam bstan pa ci 'dra bar// der ni pad+ma 'dra ba'i khri//
145b7(mdo sde): de lta bu yang bsham par bya// khri de la ni 'dug nas su// mdo sde 'di ni rab tu bstan// yi ger bris pa bklag par bya// de bzhin yongs su chub par bya// khri de las ni babs nas su//
146a1(mdo sde): yul gzhan song bar gyur na yang // khri de la ni yod pa yi// cho 'phrul rnams kyang snang bar 'gyur// chos smra ba yi gzugs su yang // de na res 'ga' snang bar gyur
146a2(mdo sde): res 'ga' sangs rgyas gzugs su ste/ / res 'ga' byang chub sems dpa' yang // res 'ga' kun tu bzang po dang // de bzhin 'jam dpal gzugs su ste// res 'ga' byams pas
146a3(mdo sde): gzugs su yang / / khri de la ni snang bar 'gyur// res 'ga' 'od ni 'bar shing snang // res 'ga' lha rnams snang bar 'gyur// yud tsam zhig ni der snang nas// de nas mi snang bar yang
146a4(mdo sde): 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas mthong na bsngags par 'gyur// thams cad du yang grub par byed// dpal yon bkra shis phun sum tshogs// mtshan ma sangs rgyas sprul pa yin// rgyal dang dpal
146a5(mdo sde): dang grags par byed/ / phyir rgol ba yang zlog par byed// pha rol dgra tshogs rab tu 'joms// g.yul du dgra rnams phung bar byed// mi ngan thams cad zhi bar byed// sdipa thams cad
146a6(mdo sde): rab tu 'jig/ sdig pa thams cad rab zhi byed// g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar byed// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir thams cad du// grags pas rab tu gang bar 'gyur// de yi dgra rnams thams
146a7(mdo sde): cad ni/ / shin tu pham pa nyid du 'gyur// rtag tu dgra ni choms par 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs// g.yul ngo'i gdong las rnam par rgyal// dgra dang bral zhing mchog tu
146b1(mdo sde): dka'/ / tshangs dbang sum cu rtsa gsum dbang // de bzhin 'jig rten skyong rnams dang // lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang // rgyal ba khyu mchog yang dag shes// klu yi rgyal po ma dros dang // de
146b2(mdo sde): bzhin du ni rgya mtsho dang / / mi 'am ci dbang lha min dbang // de bzhin nam mkha' lding dbang po// de dag las ni sogs pa dang // lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang // chos kyi mchod rten
146b3(mdo sde): bsam yas la/ / rtag tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur// zhe sar bcas pa'i sems can rnams// mthong nas shin tu dga' bar 'gyur// lha yi dbang po mchog de dag/ thams cad 'di
146b4(mdo sde): snyam sems par 'gyur/ / lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang // phan tshun du ni smra byed pa// bsod nams dpal dang gzi brjid dag/ bsags pa de dag kun la ltos// gang dag mdo sde
146b5(mdo sde): zab mo 'di/ / nyan pa'i don du 'dir lhags pa// mi de dag ni rab sbyangs pa'i// dge ba'i rtsa bas 'dir lhags so// dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas// chos kyi mchod rten gus dang
146b6(mdo sde): bcas/ / de dag 'jig rten snying rjer ldan// de dag sems can phan byed pas// de dag zab mo'i chos rnams kyi// dam pa'i chos kyi ro yi snod// chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa yin//
146b7(mdo sde): de dag rab tu 'jug pa yin// gang dag gser 'ong dam pa'i mdo// dge ba dam pa 'di nyan pas// de dag sngon chad sangs rgyas ni// brgya stong rnams la mchod pa yin// dge ba'i rtsa
147a1(mdo sde): ba 'di yis ni/ / mdo 'di nyan pa de dag la// lha dbang rgyal po kun dang ni// dbyangs can dang ni de bzhin du// dpal ldan rnam thos bu dang ni// gnod sbyin brgya
147a2(mdo sde): phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis// phyogs bzhi dag ni kun nas kyang // srung ba shin tu byed par 'gyur// dbang po zla ba gshin rje dang // rlung dang chu lha nyid dang
147a3(mdo sde): ni/ / skem byed 'jug sel dbyangs can dang // sreg bye za dang skye dgu dang // stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa// 'jig rten skyong ba de kun kyang // nyin mtshan g.yel ba med par ni//
147a4(mdo sde): de dag rnams la srung bar byed// stobs chen gnod sbyin dbang gnyis dang // sred med bu dang dbang phyug che// yang dag shes la sogs pa dag/ gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang // gnod
147a5(mdo sde): sbyin brgya phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis// 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad las// de dag la ni srung bar byed// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang // gnod
147a6(mdo sde): sbyin dag ni lnga brgya dang / / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang // de dag la ni srung bar byed// gnod sbyin dbang po nor bu bzang // de bzhin grangs pa bzang po dang // ji 'jigs
147a7(mdo sde): dang ni 'brog gnas dang / / dmar ser dang ni ser skya dang // gnod sbyin dbang po re re yang // gnod sbyin lnga brgya dag gis ni// gang dag mdo sde 'di thos pas// de dag rnams la srung
147b1(mdo sde): byed 'gyur/ / dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni// rgyal ba khyu mchog rgyal ba'i rgyal// nor bu'i mgul dang nges mgrin dang // de bzhin tshar ba'i bdag po dang // kham po che dang nag po dang /
147b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gser 'dra'i sgra dang ni// lngas rtsen dang nir rkang dang // de bzhin skal ba chen po dang // yur ba can dang chos skyong dang // spre'u dang de bzhin khri byed dang // khab kyi spu dang gnyen
147b3(mdo sde): bshes dang / / de bzhin rin chen skra dang ni// yur chen can dang khyim med dang // 'dod pa'i mchog dang tsan dan dang // mthu bo che dang gangs can dang // bde ba'i ri nyid de bzhin te//
147b4(mdo sde): stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de kun kyang // gang dag mdo sde 'di dga' ba// de dag la ni srung bar byed// klu yi dbang po ma dros dang // de bzhin du ni rgya mtsho/
147b5(mdo sde): dang // e la'i 'dab dang btang bzung dang // dga' bo nye dga' gnyis ka dang // klu ni brgya phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan pa rnams// 'jigs zhing skrag pa thams cad
147b6(mdo sde): las/ / de dag la ni srung bar byed// stobs chen sgra gcan mi gtong dang // thag bzangs ris dang bde mchog dang // rab sim byed dang phrag rtsub dang // de bzhin lha min dbang gzhan dang //
147b7(mdo sde): lha min brgya phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis// 'jigs skrag byung bar gyur pa las// de dag la ni srung bar 'gyur// 'byung po'i ma mo 'phrog ma ni//
148a1(mdo sde): lnga brgya'i bu dang bcas pa yang // 'dug dang nyal dang ra ro'i tshe// de dag la ni srung bar byed// gdol pa mo dang gtum mo dang // de bzhin gnod sbyin gtum mo dang /
148a2(mdo sde): dung can dang ni so brtsegs dang // sems can kun gyi gzi 'phrog ma// stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de kun kyang // phyogs bzhi dag ni kun nas su// de dag rnam
148a3(mdo sde): la srung bar byed/ / dbyangs can dag la sogs pa rnams// lha mo bsam gyis mi khyab dang // dpal la sogs pa de bzhin du// lha mo dag ni thams cad dang // sa yi lha mo nyid dang ni//
148a4(mdo sde): lo tog 'bras bu nags lha dang // kun dga' shing ljon mchod rten la// gnas pa dag dang rlung lha dang // lha rnams de dag thams cad 'dir// rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis ni// gang dag
148a5(mdo sde): mdo sde 'di dga' ba/ / de dag rnams la srung bar byed// tshe dang mdog dang stobs rnams la// sems can dag ni sbyor bar byed// dpal dang bsod nams gzi brjid kyi// phun sum
148a6(mdo sde): tshogs pas rtag tu brgyan/ / gza' dang rgyu skar gnod pa dang // de dag thams cad zhi bar byed// rgud dang sdig dang rmi lang pa// de dag thams cad zhi bar byed// zab cing stobs chen
148a7(mdo sde): ldan pa yis/ / sa yi lha mo nyid kyang ni// gser gyi 'od kyi dam pa yi// mdo sde'i dbang po'i ro yis tshim// dpag tshad dge ni brgya yi phrag/ stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad nas// rdo rje'i gdan la thug par
148b1(mdo sde): du/ / sa yi bcud ni rab tu 'phel// dpag tshad brgyar ni tshang ba yi// 'og tu sa yi bcud stong ste// de ni phyir yang log nas ni// sa yi steng dag snum par byed// mdo 'di mnyan pa'i stobs kyis
148b2(mdo sde): ni/ / lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang // gser gyi 'od ni dam pa yi// mdo sde'i dbang po'i ros tshim 'gyur// gzi byin ldan par dang 'gyur zhing // de bzhin rab tu stobs ldan 'gyur// bde
148b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur zhing tshim par 'gyur/ / 'dzam bu'i gling 'di thams cad na// 'bras bu lo tog nags lha rnams// sna tshogs ro yis tshim 'gyur zhing // shin tu rab tu dga' bar 'gyur//
148b4(mdo sde): mdo 'di'i ro yis tshim gyur nas// 'bras bu rnams dang lo tog dang // me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang // 'bras bu'i shing ljon sna tshogs kyang // kun nas rab tu skye bar byed// 'bras bu shing
148b5(mdo sde): ljon thams cad kyang / / kun dga' dag dang nags rnams dang // me tog rab tu chags byed cing // sna tshogs dri ni rab tu 'byin// me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang // 'bras bu sna tshogs ldan
148b6(mdo sde): pa yi/ / rtswa dang nags tshal thams cad dang // sa yi steng na skye bar byed// 'dzam bu'i gling 'di thams cad na// klu yi bu mo bsam mi khyab// rab tu dga' ba'i sems gyur nas// rdzing bu'i
